trans: vt. 管理；经营；控制；设法

sentences.english: He was asked to manage a new department.
sentences.chinese: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.english: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.chinese: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.english: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.english: I don’t know how I’ll manage it , but I’ll be there.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道怎么去，但我会去的。

sentences.english: I don’t know how she manages with seven children.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道七个孩子她是怎么应付的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理；设法；成功应付，对付
detailed_translations.english: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it

name: miss
trans: n. 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment with Miss Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 我想约一下泰勒小姐。

detailed_translations.english: used in front of the family name of a woman who is not married to address her politely, to write to her, or to talk about her

name: option
trans: n.  选项；选择权；买卖的特权

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

name: particular
trans: n. 详细说明；个别项目
adj. 特别的；详细的；独有的；挑剔的

sentences.english: In this particular case, no one else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 这件事没有其他人牵涉其中。

sentences.english: Most students choose one particular area for research.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生选择一个特定领域进行研究。

sentences.english: Marty’s very particular about his food.
sentences.chinese: 马蒂对食物很挑剔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别的，特指的；讲究的；挑剔的，吹毛求疵的
detailed_translations.english: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other

name: post
trans: vt. 张贴；公布；邮递；布置

sentences.english: a fence post
sentences.chinese: 篱笆桩

sentences.english: The exam results were posted on the bulletin board yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩昨天在布告板上贴出来了。

detailed_translations.english: a strong upright piece of wood, metal etc that is fixed into the ground, especially to support something
to put up a public notice about something on a wall or notice board

name: private
trans: adj. 私人的；私有的；私下的

sentences.english: Morris has a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: He made some notes for his private use.
sentences.chinese: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.english: They objected to any form of private property .
sentences.chinese: 他们反对任何形式的私有财产。

detailed_translations.english: for use by one person or group, not for everyone

name: director
trans: n. 主任，主管；导演；人事助理

sentences.english: The company is run by a board of directors (= a group of directors ) .
sentences.chinese: 这家公司由董事会管理。

sentences.english: the director of education
sentences.chinese: 教育局局长

detailed_translations.chinese: 理事；导演；指导者；负责人
detailed_translations.english: someone who controls or manages a company

name: fly
trans: n. 飞行；苍蝇；两翼昆虫

sentences.english: Ellen flew across the room and greeted her uncle with a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere quickly and suddenly

name: ice
trans: n. 冰；冰淇淋；矜持；（俚）钻石

name: note
trans: n. 笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子

sentences.english: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.english: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.chinese: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.english: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 注解在书末。

detailed_translations.english: something that you write down to remind you of something

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

name: alarm
trans: n. 闹钟；警报，警告器；惊慌

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.english: We could not see what had alarmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
If something alarms you, it makes you afraid or anxious that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen

name: audience
trans: n. 观众；听众；读者；接见；正式会见；拜会

sentences.english: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

detailed_translations.english: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work

name: chain
trans: vt. 束缚；囚禁；用铁链锁住

sentences.english: ...a large supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

name: charge
trans: n. 费用；电荷；掌管；控告；命令；负载
vt. 使充电；使承担；指责；装载；对…索费；向…冲去
vi. 充电；控告；索价；向前冲；记在账上

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass

name: date
trans: n. 日期；约会；年代；枣椰子
vi. 过时；注明日期；始于（某一历史时期）

sentences.english: The date on the letter was 30th August 1962.
sentences.chinese: 信上的日期是1962年8月30日。

sentences.english: What’s today’s date?
sentences.chinese: 今天几号？

sentences.english: Make sure you sign and date it at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在底下签上姓名和日期。

detailed_translations.english: a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number
to write or print the date on something

name: deal
trans: n. 交易；（美）政策；待遇；份量
vi. 处理；讨论；对待；做生意
vt. 处理；给予；分配；发牌

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

name: elderly
trans: adj. 上了年纪的；过了中年的；稍老的

sentences.english: a well-dressed elderly woman
sentences.chinese: 穿着考究的老妇人

sentences.english: The elderly are a formidable force in any election.
sentences.chinese: 老年人在任何选举中都是一股强大的力量。

detailed_translations.english: used as a polite way of saying that someone is old or becoming old

detailed_translations.chinese: 到了晚年的人， 老年人
detailed_translations.english: The elderly are people who are old

name: exist
trans: vi. 存在；生存；生活；继续存在

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

name: express
trans: n. 快车，快递，专使；捷运公司
adj. 明确的；迅速的；专门的

sentences.english: Parents have expressed their concerns about their children’s safety.
sentences.chinese: 父母对自己孩子的安全表示忧虑。

sentences.english: She expressed an interest in seeing York.
sentences.chinese: 她表示有兴趣见见约克。

sentences.english: Many people have expressed their opposition to the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 许多人反对这些提议。

sentences.english: He first learnt to express himself through movement at his dance classes.
sentences.chinese: 他最初是在舞蹈班学会通过动作表达情感的。

sentences.english: Words can’t express (= it is impossible to describe ) how angry we felt.
sentences.chinese: 我们的愤怒无以言表。

sentences.english: London–Gatwick Express/Orient Express (=a fast train or bus which does a particular journey regularly)
sentences.chinese: 伦敦﹣盖特威克快车/东方快车

sentences.english: Send these books by express.
sentences.chinese: 把这些书用快递寄出去。

detailed_translations.english: to tell or show what you are feeling or thinking by using words, looks, or actions
a train or bus that does not stop in many places and therefore travels quickly

name: imagine
trans: vi. 想像；猜想；想像起来

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。

sentences.english: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.english: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.chinese: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

name: range
trans: vt. 漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动
vi. （在...内）变动；平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

name: relate
trans: vi. 涉及；认同；符合；与…有某种联系

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

name: serve
trans: vi. 服役，服务；适合，足够；发球；招待，侍候
vt. 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用

sentences.english: There was only one girl serving customers .
sentences.chinese: 只有一个女孩在接待顾客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用
detailed_translations.english: to help the customers in a shop, especially by bringing them the things that they want
the action in a game such as tennis or  volleyball  when you throw the ball in the air and hit it over the net

name: smart
trans: adj. 聪明的；巧妙的；敏捷的；厉害的；潇洒的；剧烈的；时髦的

sentences.english: My eyes were smarting with the smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛被烟熏得发痛。

detailed_translations.english: to feel a sharp stinging pain in a part of your body

name: specific
trans: adj. 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的； 具有特效的

sentences.english: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.english: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

name: trade
trans: n. 贸易，交易；行业；职业
vi. 交易，买卖；以物易物

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

name: moment
trans: n. 片刻，瞬间，时刻；重要，契机

sentences.english: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.english: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.english: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.english: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.english: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.english: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.english: It was quiet for a moment, then Rae spoke.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

name: necessary
trans: adj. 必要的；必需的；必然的

sentences.english: The booklet provides all the necessary information about the college.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子提供了关于那所学院的所有必需信息。

sentences.english: No further changes were considered necessary.
sentences.chinese: 没有必要作出进一步改变。

sentences.english: The doctor says it may be necessary for me to have an operation.
sentences.chinese: 医生说我可能需要做手术。

sentences.english: The closure of the factory was a necessary consequence of increased competition from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 工厂倒闭是来自国外的竞争加剧的必然结果。

detailed_translations.english: something that is necessary is what you need to have or need to do

name: labor
trans: n. 劳动；工作；劳工；分娩

sentences.english: I should assign you your share of labor, and compel you to accomplish it.
sentences.chinese: 我要把属于你的那份劳动分配给你，并且强迫你完成它。

sentences.english: For the happiness of human labor, this is how magnificent cause, this goal is how great!
sentences.chinese: 为人类的幸福而劳动，这是多么壮丽的事业，这个目标有多么伟大！

sentences.english: However, after years of labor in their chosen field, they begin to hate their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他们在选择的领域工作了几年后，便开始痛恨自己的工作。

name: accept
trans: vt. 接受；承认；承担；承兑；容纳

sentences.english: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.english: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.english: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

name: act
trans: n. 行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势
vi. 行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

name: advantage
trans: n. 优势；利益；有利条件
vt. 有利于；使处于优势

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.english: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

name: ancient
trans: adj. 古代的；古老的，过时的；年老的

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Asia
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

sentences.english: an ancient walled city
sentences.chinese: 有城墙的古城

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

sentences.english: The new resort area has boosted tourism.
sentences.chinese: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推动， 促进， 激励； 替…做广告， 宣扬； 提高， 使增长
detailed_translations.english: to increase or improve something and make it more successful
something that gives someone more confidence, or that helps something increase, improve, or become successful

name: content
trans: n. 内容，目录；满足；容量

sentences.english: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

detailed_translations.english: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

sentences.english: insects that damage crops
sentences.chinese: 破坏庄稼的昆虫

sentences.english: There may be permanent brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 可能有永久性脑损伤。

detailed_translations.english: to cause physical harm to something or to part of someone’s body
physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured

sentences.english: a dazzling display (= very good display ) of flowers
sentences.chinese: 令人目眩神迷的花卉展

sentences.english: The window display caught her eye.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗陈列吸引了她的目光。

sentences.english: shop windows displaying the latest fashions
sentences.chinese: 展示最新时装的商店橱窗

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement of things for people to look at or buy
to show something to people, or put it in a place where people can see it easily

name: identify
trans: vt. 确定；鉴定；识别，辨认出；使参与；把…看成一样 vi. 确定；认同；一致

sentences.english: He was too far away to be able to identify faces.
sentences.chinese: 他离得太远，没法看面孔认出谁是谁。

sentences.english: The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
sentences.chinese: 警方采集了指纹，对尸体作了身份确认。

detailed_translations.english: to recognize and correctly name someone or something

sentences.english: The Labour Party won a huge majority at the last general election.
sentences.chinese: 工党在上次大选中以巨大的票数优势获胜。

detailed_translations.english: most of the people or things in a group

name: organization
trans: n. 组织；机构；体制；团体

sentences.english: The public expect high standards from any large organization.
sentences.chinese: 公众对任何大型机构都期望很高。

sentences.english: the World Trade Organization
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易组织

sentences.english: a voluntary organization which helps disabled people with their transport needs
sentences.chinese: 帮助残疾人士满足其交通需求的一个志愿组织

sentences.english: an illegal terrorist organization
sentences.chinese: 非法的恐怖组织

sentences.english: international organizations such as the UN
sentences.chinese: 诸如联合国之类的国际组织

detailed_translations.english: a group such as a club or business that has formed for a particular purpose

name: production
trans: n. 成果；产品；生产；作品

sentences.english: That model won't go into production before late 2007.
sentences.chinese: 那种型号要到2007年底才会投入生产。

sentences.english: a drop in oil and gas production
sentences.chinese: 石油和天然气产量的下降

detailed_translations.english: the process of making or growing things to be sold, especially in large quantities

sentences.english: His immediate response was one of disbelief.
sentences.chinese: 他的第一反应是不相信。

sentences.english: Carl made no response , and carried on with his meal.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔没有回答，继续吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done as a reaction to something that has happened or been said

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

name: search
trans: vt. 搜索；搜寻；调查；搜查；探求

sentences.english: It was too dark to search further.
sentences.chinese: 天太暗，无法继续寻找。

sentences.english: The area was thoroughly searched .
sentences.chinese: 这一地区已被彻底搜查过。

sentences.english: I’ve searched high and low (= everywhere ) for my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 我到处找我的眼镜。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find someone or something by looking very carefully
an attempt to find someone or something

sentences.english: the government’s long-term economic strategy
sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

sentences.english: a company’s business strategy
sentences.chinese: 公司的经营策略

detailed_translations.english: a planned series of actions for achieving something

name: struggle
trans: vt. 使劲移动；尽力使得

sentences.english: They had to struggle against all kinds of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不同各种困境斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to try extremely hard to achieve something, even though it is very difficult

name: trouble
trans: n. 麻烦；烦恼；故障；动乱

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

name: cream
trans: n. 奶油，乳脂；精华；面霜；乳酪

sentences.english: fresh cream
sentences.chinese: 鲜奶油

sentences.english: strawberries and cream
sentences.chinese: 浇奶油的草莓

sentences.english: cream silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 乳白色的长筒丝袜

detailed_translations.english: a thick yellow-white liquid that rises to the top of milk

sentences.english: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
sentences.chinese: 那女人手指上戴着戒指，因此我猜想她已经结婚了。

sentences.english: We ate with our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手抓着吃。

detailed_translations.english: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb

name: loss
trans: n. 减少；亏损；失败；遗失

sentences.english: The company is closing down two of its factories, leading to 430 job losses .
sentences.chinese: 公司要关闭其中的两家工厂，这将造成430人失业。

sentences.english: Weight loss should be gradual.
sentences.chinese: 减肥应该循序渐进。

sentences.english: a type of hearing loss that affects language development
sentences.chinese: 一种会影响语言能力发展的听力丧失

sentences.english: Brazil's 2–1 loss to Argentina
sentences.chinese: 巴西对阿根廷1:2的落败

detailed_translations.english: the fact of no longer having something, or of having less of it than you used to have, or the process by which this happens

name: negative
trans: adj.  负的；消极的；否定的；阴性的
n. 否定；负数； 底片

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否定的，消极的；负的，阴性的
detailed_translations.english: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones

detailed_translations.chinese: 负片， 底片； 负数
detailed_translations.english: an image on a photographic film that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark, from which the final picture is printed

name: sunscreen
trans: n. （防晒油中的）遮光剂；防晒霜

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.english: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.english: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.chinese: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

name: characteristic
trans: adj. 典型的；特有的；表示特性的

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character
a quality or feature of something or someone that is typical of them and easy to recognize

name: claim
trans: n. 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得
vt. 要求；声称；需要；认领

sentences.english: I don’t claim to be a feminist, but I’d like to see more women in top jobs.
sentences.chinese: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

sentences.english: Opposition leaders will claim victory if the turnout is lower than 50%.
sentences.chinese: 如果投票率低于 50%，反对党领袖将宣布获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 声称，主张；对…提出要求，索取；使失踪或死亡；需要，值得
detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求； 认领； 索赔； 声称， 断言
detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

name: contain
trans: vt. 包含；控制；容纳；牵制（敌军）

sentences.english: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.english: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

detailed_translations.english: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

name: emotional
trans: adj. 情绪的；易激动的；感动人的

sentences.english: She provided emotional support at a very distressing time for me.
sentences.chinese: 在我非常痛苦的时候，她是我的情感支柱。

sentences.english: Ann suffered from depression and a number of other emotional problems.
sentences.chinese: 安患了抑郁症，还遇到一些其他的情绪问题。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional state of the patient
sentences.chinese: 患者的生理和情绪状态

sentences.english: The funeral was a very emotional experience for all of us.
sentences.chinese: 那次葬礼对我们大家来说都是一次无比伤感的经历。

sentences.english: He became very emotional when we had to leave.
sentences.chinese: 当我们不得不离开时，他非常伤感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 情绪(上)的，情感(上)的；激起感情的； 敏感的；情绪激动的〔尤指哭泣〕
detailed_translations.english: relating to your feelings or how you control them

name: engage
trans: vi. 从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合
vt. 吸引，占用；使参加；雇佣；使订婚；预定

sentences.english: She engaged the clutch and the car moved.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.english: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

detailed_translations.english: if you engage part of a machine, or if it engages, it moves so that it fits into another part of the machine

name: essential
trans: n. 本质；要素；要点；必需品
adj. 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

name: feature
trans: n. 特色，特征；容貌；特写或专题节目
vt. 特写；以…为特色；由…主演

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

name: feed
trans: n. 饲料；饲养；（动物或婴儿的）一餐
vt. 喂养；供给；放牧；抚养（家庭等）；靠…为生

sentences.english: Have you fed the cat?
sentences.chinese: 你喂猫了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to give food to a person or animal

name: fresh
trans: adj. 新鲜的；清新的；淡水的；无经验的

sentences.english: I’ll just make some fresh coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我来重新煮点咖啡。

sentences.english: The report provides fresh evidence about the way the business was run.
sentences.chinese: 报告提供了有关该公司运营方式的新证据。

sentences.english: You’ll have to start again on a fresh sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 你得拿张新的纸重新开始。

sentences.english: The beans are fresh from the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这些豆子是刚从园子里摘来的。

detailed_translations.english: adding to or replacing something

name: importance
trans: n. 价值；重要；重大；傲慢

sentences.english: He was full of his own importance (= he behaved in an annoying way which showed that he thought he was very important ).
sentences.chinese: 他自以为很了不起。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being important

sentences.english: In this instance I think she was mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上我认为她弄错了。

detailed_translations.english: an example of a particular kind of situation

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

name: peer
trans: n. 贵族；同等的人；同龄人

sentences.english: American children did less well in math than their peers in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.english: Staff members are trained by their peers.
sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

name: predict
trans: vi. 作出预言；作预料，作预报

sentences.english: Sales were five percent lower than predicted.
sentences.chinese: 销售额比预期低5%。

sentences.english: As Liz had predicted , the rumours were soon forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 正如利兹所预料的，流言很快就被淡忘了。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something will happen, before it happens

sentences.english: The first edition was published in 1765.
sentences.chinese: 第一版于1765年出版。

sentences.english: They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.
sentences.chinese: 那部词典他们将以光盘版的形式推出。

sentences.english: We love reading your letters and we try to publish as many as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.english: The latest unemployment figures will be published tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold

name: release
trans: vt. 释放；发射；让与；允许发表

sentences.english: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.english: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

sentences.english: You need to release the tension in these shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你需要放松肩部肌肉。

sentences.english: The new trade figures have just been released.
sentences.chinese: 新的贸易数字刚刚公布。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

sentences.english: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.english: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

detailed_translations.english: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist

sentences.english: I pay the rent at the beginning of every month.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.english: She rents out two rooms to students.
sentences.chinese: 她把两个房间出租给学生

detailed_translations.english: the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else
to let someone live in a house, room etc that you own, or use your land, in return for money

name: respect
trans: n. 尊敬，尊重；方面；敬意

sentences.english: The boys showed a complete lack of respect for authority.
sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of admiring someone or what they do, especially because of their personal qualities, knowledge, or skills
to admire someone because they have high standards and good qualities such as fairness and honesty

sentences.english: They had great difficulty in finding a replacement.
sentences.chinese: 他们找接替的人费了很大劲

sentences.english: If you have any difficulties, give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遇到困难，就给我打电话。

sentences.english: She soon got into difficulty with debt.
sentences.chinese: 她很快就因债务陷入了困境。

detailed_translations.english: if you have difficulty doing something, it is difficult for you to do

name: event
trans: n. 事件，大事；项目；结果

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

name: foreign
trans: adj. 外国的；外交的；异质的；不相关的

sentences.english: foreign students
sentences.chinese: 外国学生

sentences.english: Can you speak any foreign languages?
sentences.chinese: 你会讲外语吗？

detailed_translations.english: from or relating to a country that is not your own

name: household
trans: n. 全家人，一家人；(包括佣工在内的)家庭，户
adj. 家庭的；日常的；王室的

sentences.english: household chores
sentences.chinese: 家务杂活

sentences.english: ...growing up in a male-only household.
sentences.chinese: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭的， 家喻户晓的
detailed_translations.english: relating to looking after a house and the people in it
A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

sentences.english: Try to satisfy your hunger by eating some fruit.
sentences.chinese: 吃些水果充充饥吧。

sentences.english: her hunger for knowledge
sentences.chinese: 她的求知欲

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you need to eat

name: pleasure
trans: n. 快乐；希望；娱乐；令人高兴的事

sentences.english: She sipped her drink with obvious pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 她小口抿着喝饮料，显然很高兴

sentences.english: the simple pleasures of life
sentences.chinese: 生活中的简单乐趣

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of happiness, enjoyment, or satisfaction that you get from an experience

name: tourist
trans: adv. 坐旅游车厢；坐经济舱

sentences.english: Cambridge is always full of tourists in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 剑桥在夏季总是挤满了游客。

sentences.english: The Statue of Liberty is a major tourist attraction .
sentences.chinese: 自由女神像是主要的旅游景点。

sentences.english: What effect will this have on the local tourist industry ?
sentences.chinese: 这对当地的旅游业会有什么影响？

detailed_translations.english: someone who is visiting a place for pleasure on holiday

name: variety
trans: n. 多样；种类；杂耍；变化，多样化

sentences.english: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.chinese: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

detailed_translations.english: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting

name: workforce
trans: n. 劳动力；工人总数，职工总数

sentences.english: Women now represent almost 50% of the workforce.
sentences.chinese: 如今女性几乎占全部劳动人口的 50%。

detailed_translations.english: all the people who work in a particular industry or company, or are available to work in a particular country or area

name: millennial
trans: adj. 一千年的；千禧年的

name: address
trans: n. 地址；演讲；致辞；说话的技巧；称呼
vt. 演说；从事；忙于；写姓名地址；向…致辞；与…说话；提出；处理

detailed_translations.english: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

sentences.english: We can’t afford to wait any longer or we’ll miss the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们再也不能等下去了，否则会赶不上飞机的。

sentences.english: The room affords a beautiful view over the city.
sentences.chinese: 这房间可以俯瞰城市美景。

sentences.english: The new law will afford protection to employees.

trans: n. 代理，中介；代理处，经销处

sentences.english: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.chinese: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

detailed_translations.english: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job

trans: vi. 出现；显得；似乎；出庭；登场

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.english: Two faces appeared at our window.
sentences.chinese: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.english: The car seemed to appear from nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

name: attend
trans: vi. 出席；致力于；照料；照顾
vt. 出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴

sentences.english: Only 12 people attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.english: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.english: On his deathbed the General was attended by several doctors.
sentences.chinese: 将军临终时有几名医生在照料他。

detailed_translations.english: to go to an event such as a meeting or a class

name: board
trans: n. 董事会；木板；甲板；膳食
vt. 上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿

sentences.english: a board meeting
sentences.chinese: 董事会会议

sentences.english: a board member
sentences.chinese: 董事会成员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

sentences.english: Despite strong criticism , the new system is still in place.
sentences.chinese: 尽管遭到了猛烈的批评，新制度依然原封不动。

sentences.english: There has been widespread criticism of the decision.
sentences.chinese: 这一决定受到了普遍的批评。

sentences.english: We try to give students constructive criticism .
sentences.chinese: 我们设法对学生提出有建设性的批评。

sentences.english: Another criticism levelled at him was that his teaching methods were old-fashioned.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个针对他的批评是，他的教学方法已经过时。

sentences.english: The government’s economic strategy has attracted a lot of criticism .
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策招致了大量的批评。

sentences.english: You must learn to accept criticism .
sentences.chinese: 你必须学会接受批评。

sentences.english: Many employees find it hard to take even mild criticism .
sentences.chinese: 有许多员工甚至连轻微的批评也很难接受。

sentences.english: His actions provoked severe criticism from civil rights groups.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为招致了民权组织的严厉批评。

sentences.english: the storm of criticism that followed his announcement
sentences.chinese: 他的声明引来的批评浪潮

sentences.english: literary criticism
sentences.chinese: 文学评论

detailed_translations.english: remarks that say what you think is bad about someone or something

name: determine
trans: vt. 决定，确定；判定，判决；限定
vi. 确定；决定；判决，终止；了结，终止，结束

sentences.english: Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

detailed_translations.english: to find out the facts about something

name: electronic
trans: n. 电子电路；电子器件

sentences.english: electronic games
sentences.chinese: 电子游戏

sentences.english: an electronic organizer (= a small piece of electronic equipment that you can use to record addresses, phone numbers etc )
sentences.chinese: 电子记事本

detailed_translations.english: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc

sentences.english: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

detailed_translations.english: to make certain that something will happen properly

sentences.english: Coal is one of the cheapest fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤是最廉价的燃料之一。

if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it

name: hit
trans: n. 打；打击；（演出等）成功；讽刺
vt. 打击；袭击；碰撞；偶然发现；伤…的感情
vi. 打；打击；碰撞；偶然碰上

sentences.english: Which band had a hit with ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’?
sentences.chinese: 《波希米亚狂想曲》是哪支乐队风行一时的歌曲？

detailed_translations.english: something such as a film, play, song etc that is very popular and successful

sentences.english: an implied threat
sentences.chinese: 隐含的威胁

sentences.english: The high level of radiation in the rocks implies that they are volcanic in origin.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石内的高辐射水平显示它们是由火山作用形成的。

detailed_translations.english: to suggest that something is true, without saying this directly

name: indicate
trans: vt. 表明；指出；预示；象征

sentences.english: The study indicates a connection between poverty and crime.
sentences.chinese: 研究显示贫穷和犯罪有关联。

detailed_translations.english: to show that a particular situation exists, or that something is likely to be true

sentences.chinese: 钢琴课

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car

name: military
trans: adj. 军事的；军人的；适于战争的

sentences.english: a military helicopter
sentences.chinese: 军用直升机

sentences.english: military equipment
sentences.chinese: 军事设备

sentences.english: The government has threatened to take military action if the rebels do not withdraw from the area.
sentences.chinese: 政府警告说，如果叛乱分子不从该地区撤出，就要采取军事行动。

sentences.english: The United States is prepared to use military force to achieve its aims.
sentences.chinese: 美国准备动用武力达成目的。

sentences.english: a raid by European military forces
sentences.chinese: 欧洲军事力量发动的袭击

detailed_translations.english: used by, involving, or relating to the army, navy, or airforce
the military forces of a country

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

trans: n. 再生；再循环；重复利用
vt. 使再循环；使…重新利用

sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

name: remove
trans: vt. 移动，迁移；开除；调动

sentences.english: a cleaner that will remove wine stains
sentences.chinese: 可去除葡萄酒酒渍的清洁剂

sentences.english: The college removed rules that prevented women from enrolling.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学取消了禁止女性入学的规定。

detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something so that it does not exist any longer

name: solution
trans: n. 解决方案；溶液；溶解；解答

sentences.english: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.english: he solution of glucose in water
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖在水中的溶解

detailed_translations.english: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation

name: tent
trans: vt. 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿

sentences.english: We looked for a flat spot where we could pitch our tent (= put up our tent ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们寻找一个平缓的地方搭帐篷。

detailed_translations.english: a shelter consisting of a sheet of cloth supported by poles and ropes, used especially for camping

detailed_translations.chinese: 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿

trans: n. 独一无二的人或物
adj. 独特的，稀罕的； 唯一的，独一无二的

trans: vt. 改变；使多样化；变奏

sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.chinese: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.chinese: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.english: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.english: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.chinese: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.chinese: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.english: tests of varying levels of difficulty

sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

sentences.chinese: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.english: The movie has won a number of awards.

detailed_translations.english: to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
something such as a prize or money given to someone to reward them for something they have done

name: cell
trans: n. 细胞；电池；蜂房的巢室；单人小室
vi. 住在牢房或小室中

sentences.english: cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞

sentences.english: Embryos grow by cell division (= the splitting of cells ) .
sentences.chinese: 胚胎通过细胞分裂而成长。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of a living thing that can exist independently

name: drawing
trans: v. 绘画；吸引（draw的ing形式）；拖曳

sentences.english: a drawing of Canterbury Cathedral
sentences.chinese: 一幅坎特伯雷大教堂的素描画

sentences.english: I’ve never been very good at drawing.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不擅长画图。

detailed_translations.english: a picture that you draw with a pencil, pen etc

name: economics
trans: n. 经济学；国家的经济状况

sentences.english: a Harvard professor of economics
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大学的经济学教授

detailed_translations.english: the study of the way in which money and goods are produced and used

name: heat
trans: n. 高温；压力；热度；热烈

sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

sentences.english: Her illness was caused mainly by stress.
sentences.chinese: 她的病主要是由精神压力引起的。

sentences.english: The workforce is mainly made up of women.
sentences.chinese: 员工主要是女性。

sentences.english: I don’t go out much, mainly because I have to look after the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我不大出去，主要是因为我得照看孩子们。

sentences.english: Increased sales during the summer were mainly due to tourism.
sentences.chinese: 夏季销售额增加主要是由旅游业带动的。

sentences.chinese: 我们谈了各种各样的事情——主要是谈工作。

detailed_translations.english: used to mention the main part or cause of something, the main reason for something etc

trans: n. 骡；倔强之人，顽固的人；杂交种动物

sentences.chinese: 要是我有那么多钱，我早就另买一头骡子了。

sentences.chinese: 如果你步行或骑着骡子进山观光，沿途便呈现出一座又一座修道院。

sentences.chinese: 首先，穿过一片松树林，没在意骡子走过的足迹和捷径，品尝着蓝莓；然后穿过冲击堆，浪费了宝贵的精力。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that has a  donkey  and a horse as parents

name: robot
trans: n. 机器人；遥控设备，自动机械；机械般工作的人

sentences.english: cars built by robots
sentences.chinese: 机器人制造的汽车

detailed_translations.english: a machine that can move and do some of the work of a person, and is usually controlled by a computer

sentences.english: There is no heating available due to fuel shortages.
sentences.chinese: 因为燃料短缺，所以没有供暖。

sentences.english: There is no shortage of funds.
sentences.chinese: 不缺资金。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is not enough of something that people need

name: single
trans: adj. 单一的；单身的；单程的

sentences.english: A single tree gave shade from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 唯有一棵树遮阴。

sentences.english: They won the game by a single point.
sentences.chinese: 他们仅以一分的优势赢得比赛。

sentences.english: the highest price ever paid for a single work of art
sentences.chinese: 为单件艺术品所支付的最高价格

sentences.english: a single-sex school
sentences.chinese: 单一性别的学校

detailed_translations.english: only one
a ticket for a trip from one place to another but not back again

name: vehicle
trans: n.  车辆；工具；交通工具；运载工具；传播媒介；媒介物

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

sentences.english: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.chinese: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

sentences.english: Many children buy books after they have been adapted for television.
sentences.chinese: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually change your behaviour and attitudes in order to be successful in a new situation

name: appeal
trans: n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

name: divide
trans: vt. 划分；除；分开；使产生分歧

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

sentences.english: Earthquakes are extremely difficult to predict.
sentences.chinese: 地震非常难以预测。

sentences.english: I’m extremely sorry to have troubled you.
sentences.chinese: 给你添了麻烦，我十分抱歉。

detailed_translations.english: to a very great degree

name: generate
trans: vt. 使形成；发生；生殖；产生物理反应

sentences.english: a useful technique for generating new ideas
sentences.chinese: 能产生新创意的有用技术

sentences.english: The program would generate a lot of new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目将创造许多新的就业岗位。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or cause something

name: import
trans: n. 进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性
vt. 输入，进口；含…的意思

sentences.english: a ban on beef imports
sentences.chinese: 禁止进口牛肉

sentences.english: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.chinese: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口

detailed_translations.english: a product that is brought from one country into another so that it can be sold there, or the business of doing this
to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there

name: invest
trans: vt. 投资；覆盖；耗费；授予；包围

sentences.english: I’ve got a few thousand dollars I’m looking to invest.
sentences.chinese: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.english: It was very difficult to leave a home we had invested so much in.
sentences.chinese: 那个家我们投入得太多，要离开真的很难。

detailed_translations.english: to buy shares, property, or goods because you hope that the value will increase and you can make a profit

sentences.english: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.chinese: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.english: The explosion occurred at 5.30 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生在清晨5点30分。

detailed_translations.english: to happen

name: solar
trans: adj. 太阳的；日光的；利用太阳光的；与太阳相关的

sentences.english: a solar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 日食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sun

name: stick
trans: n. 棍；手杖；呆头呆脑的人

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

name: stress
trans: n. 压力；强调；紧张；重要性；重读
vt. 强调；使紧张；加压力于；用重音读

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

name: treat
trans: vt. 治疗；对待；探讨；视为

sentences.english: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.chinese: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.english: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.chinese: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.english: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.chinese: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

detailed_translations.english: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

name: update
trans: vt. 更新；校正，修正；使现代化

sentences.english: The files need updating.
sentences.chinese: 这些档案需要更新。

detailed_translations.english: to add the most recent information to something
the most recent news or information about something

name: wealthy
trans: adj. 富有的；充分的；丰裕的

sentences.english: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

name: adviser
trans: n. 顾问；劝告者；指导教师（等于advisor）

sentences.english: a financial adviser
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

detailed_translations.chinese: 顾问；劝告者；指导教师（等于advisor）
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to give advice because they know a lot about a subject, especially in business, law, or politics

sentences.english: This chapter gives you some guidelines to help you in your work.
sentences.chinese: 本章将介绍一些指导性原则，为你的工作提供帮助。

detailed_translations.english: rules or instructions about the best way to do something

name: marriage
trans: n. 结婚；婚姻生活；密切结合，合并

sentences.english: She has three daughters from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她前一次婚姻生了三个女儿。

sentences.english: The marriage took place at St Bartholomew’s Church.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是在圣巴托罗缪教堂举行的。

detailed_translations.english: the relationship between two people who are married, or the state of being married

name: medicine
trans: vt. 用药物治疗；给…用药

sentences.english: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.english: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.english: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.chinese: 现代医学的非凡成就

detailed_translations.english: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink

name: officer
trans: n. 军官，警官；公务员，政府官员；船长

sentences.english: a former Cabinet officer
sentences.chinese: 前内阁官员

sentences.english: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.chinese: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government

sentences.english: Do you fancy going to the pub?
sentences.chinese: 你想去酒吧吗？

sentences.english: a pub lunch
sentences.chinese: 酒吧午餐

sentences.english: the pub landlord
sentences.chinese: 酒吧老板

detailed_translations.english: a building in Britain where alcohol can be bought and drunk, and where meals are often served

name: neighborhood
trans: n. 附近；街坊；接近；街区

sentences.english: Iterates may be categorized into stable and unstable sets depending on whether a neighborhood under iteration converges or diverges. Some move toward stability, others away.
sentences.chinese: 根据一个受迭代影响的社区是聚合还是发散，迭代可以被归类到稳定和不稳定集。有些转向稳定，有些转离。

name: balance
trans: vt. 使平衡；结算；使相称
vi. 保持平衡；相称；抵销

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: bear
trans: vt. 忍受；承受；具有；支撑

sentences.english: a mother bear and her cubs
sentences.chinese: 母熊和它的熊崽们

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal with thick fur, that eats flesh, fruit, and insects

name: budget
trans: vt. 安排，预定；把…编入预算

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

sentences.english: a colleague of mine from the bank
sentences.chinese: 我在银行的一位同事

sentences.english: She discussed the idea with some of her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她和几位同事讨论了这个想法。

detailed_translations.english: someone you work with – used especially by professional people

name: commit
trans: vt. 犯罪，做错事；把...交托给；指派…作战；使…承担义务

sentences.english: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
sentences.chinese: 女性犯罪比男性少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
detailed_translations.english: to do something wrong or illegal

sentences.english: artistic creativity
sentences.chinese: 艺术创造力

sentences.english: Teachers have been attacked for stifling creativity in their pupils.
sentences.chinese: 教师被批评压抑了学生的创造力。

sentences.english: Editors complain about the lack of creativity in the ideas put to them.
sentences.chinese: 编辑们抱怨说交给他们的选题缺乏创意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to use your imagination to produce new ideas, make things etc

name: critic
trans: n. 批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人

sentences.english: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.chinese: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc

name: critical
trans: adj. 鉴定的； 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

name: divorce
trans: vt. 使离婚，使分离；与…离婚

sentences.english: David’s parents divorced when he was six.
sentences.chinese: 戴维的父母在他六岁时离婚了。

sentences.english: My father threatened to divorce her.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲威胁说要和她离婚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离婚； 分离， 脱离
detailed_translations.english: if someone divorces their husband or wife, or if two people divorce, they legally end their marriage
the legal ending of a marriage

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

sentences.english: His playing is technically brilliant, but it doesn’t excite me.
sentences.chinese: 他的演奏技巧娴熟，但并不让我激动。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager

name: fine
trans: adj. 好的；优良的；细小的，精美的；健康的；晴朗的

sentences.english: Many people regard Beethoven’s fifth symphony as his finest work.
sentences.chinese: 很多人认为贝多芬的第五交响曲是他最杰出的作品。

sentences.english: He’s a very fine player.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很优秀的选手。

sentences.english: It’s a fine idea.
sentences.chinese: 这是个很妙的主意。

sentences.english: Hatfield House is a fine example of Jacobean architecture.
sentences.chinese: 哈特菲尔德宅第是英王詹姆斯一世时期建筑的典范。

sentences.english: The restaurant was chosen for its good food and fine wines .
sentences.chinese: 这家餐厅因其美酒佳肴而入选。

detailed_translations.english: very good or of a very high standard

name: further
trans: adv. 进一步地；而且；更远地

sentences.english: They walked a little further.
sentences.chinese: 他们又往前走了一点。

sentences.english: His hands moved further down her back.
sentences.chinese: 他的手在她背上继续往下滑。

sentences.english: They’ve never been further south than San Diego.
sentences.chinese: 他们从没有到过比圣迭戈更往南的地方。

detailed_translations.english: a greater distance, or beyond a particular place
more or additional

name: gap
trans: n. 间隙；缺口；差距；分歧

sentences.english: ...the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: …贫富差距。

detailed_translations.english: a big difference between two situations, amounts, groups of people etc

name: handle
trans: vt. 处理；操作；运用；买卖；触摸

sentences.english: I handled most of the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 大部分文书工作是我做的。

sentences.english: The case is being handled by a top lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 此案正由一位顶尖律师负责处理。

sentences.english: The finance department handles all the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 财务部处理所有账目。

sentences.english: Computers can handle huge amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 计算机能处理大量数据。

detailed_translations.english: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job

sentences.english: They would inform him of any progress they had made.
sentences.chinese: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

sentences.english: My daughter informed me that she was pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿告诉我她怀孕了。

detailed_translations.english: If you inform someone of something, you tell them about it
to officially tell someone about something or give them information

sentences.english: I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

name: key
trans: n. （打字机等的）键；关键；钥匙
vt. 键入；锁上；调节…的音调；提供线索

sentences.english: A bunch of keys hung from his belt.
sentences.chinese: 他的皮带上挂着一串钥匙。

sentences.english: Press the ‘Escape’ key to exit.
sentences.chinese: 按退出键退出。

sentences.english: Check your answers in the key at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 用书后的解答核对答案。

detailed_translations.english: a small specially shaped piece of metal that you put into a lock and turn in order to lock or unlock a door, start a car etc

sentences.english: to lie on your back/side/front
sentences.chinese: 仰 / 侧 / 俯卧

sentences.english: The book lay open on his desk.
sentences.chinese: 那本书摊开放在他的书桌上。

sentences.english: The town lies in a small wooded valley.
sentences.chinese: 该城镇坐落于一个林木茂盛的山谷中。

detailed_translations.english: to be or put yourself in a flat or horizontal position so that you are not standing or sitting

name: light
trans: n. 光；光线；灯；打火机；领悟；浅色；天窗
adj. 轻的；浅色的；明亮的；轻松的；容易的；清淡的
adv. 轻地；清楚地；轻便地

sentences.english: You can carry this bag – it’s fairly light.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.english: You should wear light, comfortable shoes.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

sentences.english: The truck was quite light and easy to drive.
sentences.chinese: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.english: people who have suffered only light exposure to radiation
sentences.chinese: 只受到轻度辐射的人

detailed_translations.english: not very heavy

name: minor
trans: adj. 未成年的；次要的；较小的；小调的；二流的
n. 未成年人；小调；副修科目

sentences.english: We have made some minor changes to the program.
sentences.chinese: 我们对那个程序做了一些小改动。

sentences.english: a relatively minor error
sentences.chinese: 相对较小的错误

sentences.english: a minor road
sentences.chinese: 小路

sentences.english: They played only a minor role in local government.
sentences.chinese: 他们在当地政府里只是扮演次要角色。

detailed_translations.english: small and not very important or serious, especially when compared with other things

name: overall
trans: adj. 全部的；全体的；一切在内的

sentences.english: The overall cost of the exhibition was £400,000.
sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.english: The overall result is an increase in population.
sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.english: An overall winner and a runner-up were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.english: We don’t want all the details now, just the overall picture.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们不需要全部细节，只要知道大致的情况。

detailed_translations.english: heavy cotton trousers with a piece covering your chest, held up by pieces of cloth that go over your shoulders
considering or including everything

name: president
trans: n. 总统；董事长；校长；主席

sentences.english: President Bush
sentences.chinese: 布什总统

sentences.english: the president of General Motors
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统；（某组织的）最高权力人
detailed_translations.english: the official leader of a country that does not have a king or queen

name: pretty
trans: n. 有吸引力的事物（尤指饰品）；漂亮的人
adj. 漂亮的；可爱的；优美的

sentences.english: a pretty little girl
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.english: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

detailed_translations.english: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face

sentences.english: You can’t judge a book by its cover, as the old saying goes.
sentences.chinese: 老话说得好，人不可貌相。

detailed_translations.english: a well-known short statement that expresses an idea most people believe is true and wise

name: significant
trans: n. 象征；有意义的事物
adj. 重大的；有效的；有意义的；值得注意的；意味深长的

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

name: stage
trans: n. 阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站
vi. 举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

name: suffer
trans: vi. 遭受，忍受；受痛苦；经验；受损害

sentences.english: At least he died suddenly and didn’t suffer.
sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.english: She’s suffering a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 她遭受着巨大的痛苦。

detailed_translations.english: to experience physical or mental pain

sentences.english: As we neared the summit, we were tiring fast.
sentences.chinese: 接近山顶时，我们感到越来越累了。

detailed_translations.english: to start to feel tired, or make someone feel tired

name: track
trans: n. 轨道；足迹，踪迹；小道
vt. 追踪；通过；循路而行；用纤拉

sentences.english: Police have been tracking the four criminals all over Central America.
sentences.chinese: 警方一直在中美洲到处追捕这四名罪犯。

detailed_translations.english: to search for a person or animal by following the marks they leave behind them on the ground, their smell etc
a line of marks left on the ground by a moving person, animal, or vehicle

name: wear
trans: v. 穿着；用旧；耗损；面露

sentences.english: The cushions are starting to wear a little.
sentences.chinese: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.english: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.chinese: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.english: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.
sentences.chinese: 你的袜子磨出了个洞。

detailed_translations.english: to become thinner or weaker after continuous use, or to make something do this

name: anyway
trans: adv. 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

sentences.english: I know I'll be confronted with difficulties, but I will squeak by anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我会遇到许多困难，可我无论如何总能应付过去。

detailed_translations.english: used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一套小公寓里。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives

name: belief
trans: n. 相信，信赖；信仰；教义

sentences.english: a strong belief in God
sentences.chinese: 笃信上帝

sentences.english: When you get something wrong, it can shake your belief in yourself.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什么事情没做好，就会动摇你对自己的信心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that something is definitely true or definitely exists

name: familiar
trans: adj. 熟悉的；常见的；亲近的

sentences.english: a familiar tune
sentences.chinese: 熟悉的曲调

sentences.english: It was a relief to be back in familiar surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 回到熟悉的环境里让人松了一口气。

sentences.english: Beggars on the street are becoming a familiar sight .
sentences.chinese: 街上出现乞丐的情况逐渐变得屡见不鲜。

sentences.english: This kind of situation was all too familiar (= very familiar ) to John.
sentences.chinese: 这种情形对约翰来说太熟悉了。

sentences.english: Her face seems vaguely familiar , but I can’t quite place her.
sentences.chinese: 她看起来有点面熟，但我还是认不出她来。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is familiar is well-known to you and easy to recognize

name: link
trans: n.  链环，环节；联系，关系
vt. 连接，连结；联合，结合
vi. 连接起来；联系在一起；将人或物连接或联系起来

sentences.english: He walked with her, linking arms (= putting his arm around her arm ).
sentences.chinese: 他与她挽臂同行。

detailed_translations.english: to join two things by putting one through the other
each ring of a chain

sentences.english: Nicotine produces a feeling of well-being in the smoker.
sentences.chinese: 尼古丁能让吸烟者产生一种愉悦的感觉。

detailed_translations.chinese: [有化] 尼古丁；[有化] 烟碱
detailed_translations.english: a substance in tobacco which makes it difficult for people to stop smoking

name: snack
trans: n. 小吃，快餐；一份，部分

sentences.english: I grabbed a quick snack.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧吃了点零食。

sentences.english: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.english: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.chinese: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food that is eaten between main meals or instead of a meal

name: speech
trans: n. 演讲；讲话； 语音；演说

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。
