sentences.english: Chris is going to work overseas.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯要去国外工作。

sentences.english: Most applications came from overseas.
sentences.chinese: 大部分申请来自海外。

detailed_translations.english: to or in a foreign country that is across the sea

name: peak
trans: n. 山峰；最高点；顶点；帽舌
vt. 使达到最高点；使竖起
vi. 消瘦；到达最高点；变憔悴

sentences.english: snow-capped mountain peaks
sentences.chinese: 白雪覆盖的山顶

sentences.english: jagged peaks
sentences.chinese: 嶙峋的山峰

sentences.english: It was a time of peak demand for the product.
sentences.chinese: 那是对该产品需求最旺的时期。

detailed_translations.english: the sharply pointed top of a mountain
used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something

sentences.english: a new drug that is in the experimental phase
sentences.chinese: 处于试验阶段的一种新药

sentences.english: It’s just a phase he’s going through.
sentences.chinese: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

detailed_translations.english: one of the stages of a process of development or change

name: primarily
trans: adv. 首先；主要地，根本上

sentences.english: The advertisement is aimed primarily at children.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告的对象主要是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: mainly

name: prompt
trans: n. 提示；付款期限；DOS命令：改变DOS系统提示符的风格
adj. 敏捷的，迅速的；立刻的
vt. 提示；促进；激起；（给演员）提白

sentences.english: Prompt action must be taken.
sentences.chinese: 必须立即采取行动。

sentences.english: Prompt payment is requested.
sentences.chinese: 请立即付款。

sentences.english: a prompt response
sentences.chinese: 迅速的答复

sentences.english: What prompted you to buy that suit?
sentences.chinese: 什么原因让你买下了那套西装？

detailed_translations.english: done quickly, immediately, or at the right time
to make someone decide to do something

name: relieve
trans: vt. 解除，减轻；使不单调乏味；换…的班；解围；使放心

sentences.english: Drugs helped to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 药物有助于舒缓疼痛。

sentences.english: A secretary was hired to relieve her of some of the administrative work.
sentences.chinese: 一个秘书被雇来为她减轻一些行政工作的负担。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce someone’s pain or unpleasant feelings

sentences.english: There were roughly 200 people there.
sentences.chinese: 那儿大约有200人。

sentences.english: Azaleas flower at roughly the same time each year.
sentences.chinese: 杜鹃花每年的开花时间大致相同。

detailed_translations.english: not exactly

sentences.english: We can only prosecute if there is sufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.english: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.english: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: as much as is needed for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Ultimately, the decision rests with the child’s parents.
sentences.chinese: 最终，决定权在这孩子的父母手中。

sentences.english: a long but ultimately successful campaign
sentences.chinese: 一场历时很久但最终成功的运动

detailed_translations.english: finally, after everything else has been done or considered

name: analytical
trans: adj. 分析的；解析的；善于分析的

sentences.english: She’s got an analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 她思维缜密。

detailed_translations.english: thinking about things in a detailed and intelligent way, so that you can examine and understand things

sentences.english: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees C.
sentences.chinese: 把烤箱预热至200摄氏度。

sentences.english: Press the mixture onto the bread and bake in a hot oven for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把混合料抹在面包上，然后在烤箱内高温烘烤10分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that food is cooked inside, shaped like a metal box with a door on the front

name: combination
trans: n. 结合；组合；联合； 化合

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

name: commission
trans: n. 委员会；佣金；犯；委任；委任状
vt. 委任；使服役；委托制作

sentences.english: The Government set up a commission to investigate allegations of police violence.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个委员会调查对警察施暴行为的指控。

detailed_translations.chinese: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have been given the official job of finding out about something or controlling something
to formally ask someone to write an official report, produce a work of art for you etc

name: competitive
trans: adj. 竞争的；比赛的；求胜心切的

sentences.english: Competitive sports encourage children to work together as a team.
sentences.chinese: 竞技体育鼓励孩子们进行团队协作。

sentences.english: Advertising is an intensely competitive business.
sentences.chinese: 广告业是一个竞争激烈的行业。

detailed_translations.english: relating to competition

name: definitely
trans: adv. 清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地

sentences.english: ‘Do you reckon Margot will be there?’ ‘ Definitely not .’
sentences.chinese: “你估计玛戈会在那里吗？” “肯定不会。”

sentences.english: The hotel fitness centre is definitely worth a visit.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店的健身中心绝对值得一去。

sentences.english: I definitely need a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我太需要休假了。

detailed_translations.english: without any doubt

sentences.english: The study demonstrates the link between poverty and malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究证明了贫困与营养不良之间的联系。

sentences.english: The government now has an opportunity to demonstrate its commitment to reform.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在有机会表明改革的决心了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说明， 论证； 表露
detailed_translations.english: to show or prove something clearly

sentences.english: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.english: Daniel: Yes, like a dolphin.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔: 嗯，像海豚一样。

detailed_translations.english: a very intelligent sea animal like a fish with a long grey pointed nose

name: domestic
trans: adj. 国内的；家庭的；驯养的；一心只管家务的

sentences.english: ...over 100 domestic flights a day to 30 leading U.S. destinations.
sentences.chinese: …每天飞往美国30个主要目的地的100多个国内航班。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries

name: emphasis
trans: n. 重点；强调；加强语气

sentences.english: a change of emphasis in government policy
sentences.chinese: 政府政策重心的变化

detailed_translations.chinese: 强调； 重视； 重要性
detailed_translations.english: special attention or importance

sentences.english: oil exploration facilities in the North Sea
sentences.chinese: 北海的石油勘探设施

sentences.english: You can then use this hut as a base for explorations into the mountains around.
sentences.chinese: 你到时可以把这间小屋当大本营，去周围的山里探险。

detailed_translations.english: the act of travelling through a place in order to find out about it or find something such as oil or gold in it

sentences.english: Businesses come and go with alarming frequency.
sentences.chinese: 商家开张停业惊人地频繁。

sentences.english: the frequency of serious road accidents
sentences.chinese: 重大道路交通事故的发生率

detailed_translations.english: the fact that something happens a lot

name: helpless
trans: adj. 无助的；无能的；没用的

sentences.english: He began to feel depressed and helpless.
sentences.chinese: 他开始觉得沮丧、无助。

sentences.english: a vicious attack on a helpless victim
sentences.chinese: 对无助受害者的残暴攻击

sentences.english: Newman threw out a hand in a helpless gesture.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼伸出手做了个无助的手势。

detailed_translations.english: unable to look after yourself or to do anything to help yourself

name: highlight
trans: n. 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；加亮区
vt. 突出；强调；使显著；加亮

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.english: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

name: induce
trans: vt. 诱导；引起；引诱；感应

sentences.english: Nothing would induce me to vote for him again.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么能诱使我再投他的票了。

sentences.english: Doctors said surgery could induce a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 医生们说手术可能导致心脏病。

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to do something, especially something that does not seem wise

name: ingredient
trans: n. 原料；要素；组成部分

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

name: layer
trans: n. 层，层次；膜；压条；放置者，计划者
vt. 把…分层堆放；借助压条法；生根繁殖；将（头发）剪成不同层次
vi. 形成或分成层次；通过压条法而生根

sentences.english: He pulled off layer upon layer of clothing (= many layers of clothing ).
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服一件件地脱掉。

detailed_translations.english: an amount or piece of a material or substance that covers a surface or that is between two other things

sentences.english: Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.chinese: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

detailed_translations.english: many

sentences.english: Emma studies philosophy at university.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛在大学攻读哲学。

detailed_translations.english: the study of the nature and meaning of existence, truth, good and evil, etc

name: pose
trans: vi. 摆姿势；佯装；矫揉造作
vt. 造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论
n. 姿势，姿态；装模作样

sentences.english: We posed for photographs.
sentences.chinese: 我们摆好姿势准备拍照。

sentences.english: Ann struck a pose (= stood or sat in a particular position ) and smiled for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 安摆好姿势露出笑脸准备拍照。

detailed_translations.english: to sit or stand in a particular position in order to be photographed or painted, or to make someone do this
the position in which someone stands or sits, especially in a painting, photograph etc

name: psychological
trans: adj. 心理的；心理学的；精神上的

sentences.english: Sleep disorders are a serious psychological problem .
sentences.chinese: 睡眠障碍是严重的心理疾病。

sentences.english: Freud’s psychological theories
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德的心理学理论

sentences.english: What was the patient’s psychological state ?
sentences.chinese: 病人的心理状态如何？

detailed_translations.english: relating to the way that your mind works and the way that this affects your behaviour

name: radical
trans: n. 基础；激进分子； 原子团； 根数
adj. 激进的；根本的；彻底的

sentences.english: They are proposing radical changes to the way the company is run.
sentences.chinese: 他们建议对公司经营模式进行重大改革。

sentences.english: a radical reform of the tax system
sentences.chinese: 税收制度的彻底改革

sentences.english: There are radical differences between the two organizations.
sentences.chinese: 这两个组织有着根本差异。

detailed_translations.chinese: 根本的，基本的；激进的，激进派的
detailed_translations.english: a radical change or difference is very big and important
someone who has new and different ideas, especially someone who wants complete social and political change

name: recovery
trans: n. 恢复，复原；痊愈；重获

sentences.english: Hopes of economic recovery are fading.
sentences.chinese: 经济复苏的希望越来越渺茫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 恢复， 痊愈； 追回， 寻回， 收复
detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better after an illness, injury etc

name: responsible
trans: adj. 负责的，可靠的；有责任的

sentences.english: We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
sentences.chinese: 我们决意要将肇事者绳之以法。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed

name: slightly
trans: adv. 些微地，轻微地；纤细地

sentences.english: His family then moved to a slightly larger house.
sentences.chinese: 他的家后来搬到了一间稍微大一点儿的房子。

sentences.english: Each person learns in a slightly different way.
sentences.chinese: 每个人学习的方式都略有不同。

detailed_translations.english: Slightly means to some degree but not to a very large degree

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

name: stem
trans: vt. 阻止；除去…的茎；给…装柄
vi. 阻止；起源于某事物；逆行

sentences.english: ‘Writ ’ is the stem of the forms ‘writes ’, ‘writing ’ and ‘written ’.
sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a word that stays the same when different endings are added to it, for example ‘driv-’ in ‘driving’

name: stimulate
trans: vi. 起刺激作用；起促进作用

sentences.english: the President’s plan to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 总统刺激经济增长的计划

sentences.english: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage or help an activity to begin or develop further

sentences.english: I was still striving to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在努力争取成功。

sentences.english: We must continue to strive for greater efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须继续为提高效率而努力。

detailed_translations.english: to make a great effort to achieve something

name: stuff
trans: n. 东西；材料；填充物；素材资料

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

name: sustain
trans: vt. 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实

sentences.english: He leant against her so heavily that she could barely sustain his weight.
sentences.chinese: 他重重地靠在她身上，让她几乎撑不住了。

sentences.english: Which planets can sustain life?
sentences.chinese: 哪些行星可以维持生命的存在？

detailed_translations.english: to hold up the weight of something

name: tone
trans: n. 语气；色调；音调；音色
vt. 增强；用某种调子说
vi. 颜色调和；呈现悦目色调

sentences.english: Her tone was sharp with anger.
sentences.chinese: 她很气愤，语气尖刻。

sentences.english: It was obvious from her tone of voice that she didn’t like me.
sentences.chinese: 从她的语气明显听得出来她不喜欢我。

detailed_translations.english: the way your voice sounds, which shows how you are feeling or what you mean

name: accomplishment
trans: n. 成就；完成；技艺，技能

sentences.english: It was a major accomplishment for a player who had been injured so recently.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个刚受过伤的选手来说，这是很好的成绩。

detailed_translations.english: something successful or impressive that is achieved after a lot of effort and hard work

sentences.english: The brochure tries to give a fair and accurate description of each hotel.
sentences.chinese: 该手册尽量公正、准确地介绍每一家酒店。

detailed_translations.english: correct and true in every detail

sentences.english: Additional information can be obtained from the centre.
sentences.chinese: 可以从中心获取更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: more than what was agreed or expected

sentences.english: Few people nowadays are able to maintain friendships into adulthood.
sentences.chinese: 现今很少有人能够把友谊维持到成年。

detailed_translations.english: the time when you are an adult

sentences.english: ...the availability of affordable housing.
sentences.chinese: …多数人支付得起的房产的供应。

detailed_translations.english: If something is affordable, most people have enough money to buy it

sentences.english: The device most often used to do this is a load balancer, which is an appliance that accepts requests from the outside world and hands them off to the next available application server.
sentences.chinese: 进行这一操作最常用的设备是一个负载均衡器，这是一个从外部接收请求并将它们移交给下一个可用应用程序服务器的装置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as a  cooker  or  washing machine  , used in people’s homes

name: artistic
trans: adj. 艺术的；风雅的；有美感的

sentences.english: artistic work
sentences.chinese: 艺术作品

sentences.english: Opinion about the artistic merit of his paintings has been mixed.
sentences.chinese: 对于他的绘画作品的艺术价值，人们褒贬不一。

detailed_translations.english: relating to art or culture

name: asset
trans: n. 资产；优点；有用的东西；有利条件；财产；有价值的人或物

sentences.english: the value of a company’s assets
sentences.chinese: 公司的资产价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 资产， 财产； 有价值的特性或技能， 优点
detailed_translations.english: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts

name: awareness
trans: n. 意识，认识；明白，知道
n. 人群对品牌或产品的认知

sentences.english: Health officials have tried to raise awareness (=  improve people’s knowledge  ) about AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部官员努力提高人们对艾滋病的认识。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject or situation

sentences.english: Get the special drill bit to bore the correct size hole for the job.
sentences.chinese: 找个特殊的钻头，钻个尺寸合适的孔。

detailed_translations.english: to make a deep round hole in a hard surface
something that is not interesting to you or that annoys you

name: bump
trans: vi. 碰撞，撞击；颠簸而行

sentences.english: She has a bump on the back of her head.
sentences.chinese: 她的后脑勺上肿起了一块。

sentences.english: He had a few injuries, mostly bumps and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 他有几处受了伤，大都是肿块和瘀青。

detailed_translations.english: an area of skin that is raised because you have hit it on something
to hit or knock against something

name: capable
trans: adj. 能干的，能胜任的；有才华的

sentences.english: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他没有能力杀人。

sentences.english: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司没有能力应付那么大的订单。

sentences.english: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我完全能够自己照顾自己，多谢了！

detailed_translations.english: having the qualities or ability needed to do something

name: concentration
trans: n. 浓度；集中；浓缩；专心；集合

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩； 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

sentences.english: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.english: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.chinese: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in dealing with a difficult problem or situation

name: corporate
trans: adj. 法人的；共同的，全体的；社团的；公司的；企业的

sentences.english: The company is moving its corporate headquarters (= main offices ) from New York to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司要把总部从纽约迁到休斯敦。

sentences.english: Vince is vice-president of corporate communications.
sentences.chinese: 文斯是负责企业宣传的副总裁。

sentences.english: Corporate America is not about to be converted to the environmentalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 美国企业界不打算投身环保事业。

sentences.english: changing the corporate culture (= the way that people in a corporation think and behave ) to accept family-friendly policies
sentences.chinese: 改变公司文化，采取更关怀家庭的政策

sentences.english: an advertising campaign intended to reinforce our corporate identity
sentences.chinese: 旨在加强我们公司形象的广告宣传活动

sentences.english: The yacht can be hired for corporate hospitality (= entertainment provided by companies for their customers ) .
sentences.chinese: 可以租下这艘游艇用于公司招待客户。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法人团体的， 公司的； 全体的， 共同的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to a corporation

name: critical
trans: adj. 鉴定的； 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

name: discipline
trans: n. 学科；纪律；训练；惩罚

sentences.english: Martial arts teach respect, discipline, and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 武术能教人尊重他人、遵守纪律并且相互合作。

sentences.english: Learning poetry is a good discipline for the memory.
sentences.chinese: 背诗是训练记忆力的一种好方法。

sentences.english: Different cultures have different ways of disciplining their children.
sentences.chinese: 不同的文化有不同的管教孩子的方法。

detailed_translations.english: a way of training someone so that they learn to control their behaviour and obey rules
to teach someone to obey rules and control their behaviour

name: dramatic
trans: adj. 戏剧的；急剧的；引人注目的；激动人心的

sentences.english: A superb goal by Owen earned United a dramatic victory yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天欧文的一个超级入球为联队赢得了激动人心的胜利。

sentences.english: Some of the most dramatic events in American history happened here.
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上一些最震撼人心的事件发生在这里。

sentences.english: the dramatic scenery of the Grand Canyon
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷的壮丽景致

detailed_translations.chinese: 引人注目的， 激动人心的； 戏剧的
detailed_translations.english: exciting or impressive

sentences.english: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.english: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.
sentences.chinese: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。

detailed_translations.english: in, at, or to another place

name: extend
trans: vt. 延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价
vi. 延伸；扩大；伸展；使疏开

sentences.english: Management have agreed to extend the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 管理层已同意延长最后期限。

detailed_translations.english: to continue for a longer period of time, or to make something last longer

name: faculty
trans: n. 科，系；能力；全体教员

sentences.english: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.
sentences.chinese: 教师和学生都反对这些措施。

detailed_translations.english: all the teachers in a university

name: gap
trans: n. 间隙；缺口；差距；分歧

sentences.english: ...the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: …贫富差距。

detailed_translations.english: a big difference between two situations, amounts, groups of people etc

sentences.english: They run a small grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

detailed_translations.english: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket

name: industrial
trans: n. 工业股票；工业工人
adj. 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的

sentences.english: By 1900, Britain was a mainly industrial society.
sentences.chinese: 到1900年英国已基本进入工业社会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to industry or the people working in it

name: irregular
trans: n. 不规则物；不合规格的产品
adj. 不规则的；无规律的；非正规的；不合法的

sentences.english: a jagged, irregular coastline
sentences.chinese: 锯齿状不规则的海岸线

sentences.english: It has a highly irregular shape, covered in bumps and indentations.
sentences.chinese: 它的外形极不规则，满是凸起和凹陷的地方。

detailed_translations.english: having a shape, surface, pattern etc that is not even, smooth, or balanced

name: multiple
trans: adj. 多重的；多样的；许多的

sentences.english: Baxter was rushed to the hospital with multiple stab wounds.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯特因多处刺伤被紧急送往医院。

sentences.english: Having multiple partners increases your risk of sexual diseases.
sentences.chinese: 性伴侣多会增加得性病的风险。

sentences.english: His new album includes multiple versions of the same songs.
sentences.chinese: 他的新专辑包括同一些歌曲的多种版本。

detailed_translations.english: many, or involving many things, people, events etc
a number that contains a smaller number an exact number of times

name: objective
trans: adj. 客观的；目标的；宾格的
n. 目的；目标； 物镜；宾格

sentences.english: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.english: the best way to accomplish your objectives
sentences.chinese: 完成目标的最佳方法

sentences.english: The degree program has two main objectives.
sentences.chinese: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.english: Managers should set specific performance objectives for their teams.
sentences.chinese: 经理应该为自己的团队制定明确的绩效目标。

sentences.english: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.
sentences.chinese: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.english: A clear objective was set and adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 定下了明确的目标并坚持到底。

sentences.english: One of your first business objectives should be to get your own office.
sentences.chinese: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics

name: odd
trans: adj. 奇数的；古怪的；剩余的；临时的；零散的
n. 奇数；怪人；奇特的事物

sentences.english: It was an odd thing to say.
sentences.chinese: 这话说得很奇怪。

sentences.english: an odd way to behave
sentences.chinese: 古怪的行为

sentences.english: They’re an odd couple.
sentences.chinese: 他们是古怪的一对。

sentences.english: There was something odd about him.
sentences.chinese: 他这人有些奇怪。

sentences.english: What she did was unforgivable, but the odd thing was he didn’t seem to mind.
sentences.chinese: 她的所作所为是不可原谅的，但奇怪的是他好像并不在意。

sentences.english: She was holding an extremely odd-looking weapon.
sentences.chinese: 她手持一件非常奇特的武器。

detailed_translations.english: different from what is normal or expected, especially in a way that you disapprove of or cannot understand

sentences.english: Depending on your circumstances you can opt for one method or the other.
sentences.chinese: 根据自己的情况，你可以选择这种或那种方法。

detailed_translations.english: to choose one thing or do one thing instead of another

name: plunge
trans: vt. 使陷入；使投入；使插入
vi. 突然地下降；投入；陷入；跳进

sentences.english: The government's political and economic reforms threaten to plunge the country into chaos.
sentences.chinese: 该政府的政治和经济改革有可能使这个国家陷入混乱之中。

sentences.english: Eddy found himself plunged into a world of brutal violence.
sentences.chinese: 埃迪发现自己突然陷入了一个残酷暴力的世界。

detailed_translations.english: to make sb/sth experience sth unpleasant

name: popularity
trans: n. 普及，流行；名气；受大众欢迎

sentences.english: The president’s popularity has declined considerably.
sentences.chinese: 总统的支持率大大下降了。

detailed_translations.english: when something or someone is liked or supported by a lot of people

name: productive
trans: adj. 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的

sentences.english: the economy’s productive capacity
sentences.chinese: 该经济体的生产能力

detailed_translations.english: relating to the production of goods, crops, or wealth

name: profitable
trans: adj. 有利可图的；赚钱的；有益的

sentences.english: The advertising campaign proved very profitable.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，这次广告宣传活动卓有成效。

sentences.english: a highly profitable business
sentences.chinese: 盈利高的企业

sentences.english: a profitable afternoon
sentences.chinese: 有收获的下午

detailed_translations.english: producing a profit or a useful result

name: promotion
trans: n. 提升， 晋升；推销，促销；促进；发扬，振兴

sentences.english: a society for the promotion of religious tolerance
sentences.chinese: 一个促进宗教包容的团体

sentences.english: I want a job with good prospects for promotion.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一份有良好晋升机会的工作。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of helping something to develop or increase

name: property
trans: n. 性质，性能；财产；所有权

sentences.english: The hotel is not responsible for any loss or damage to guests’ personal property .
sentences.chinese: 宾馆对住客个人财物的丢失和损坏概不负责。

sentences.english: Some of the stolen property was found in Mason’s house.
sentences.chinese: 在梅森家里找到了部分被盗财物。

detailed_translations.english: the thing or things that someone owns

sentences.english: Where do you get your protein?
sentences.chinese: 你从哪里获得蛋白质？

sentences.english: Dairy source of protein and calcium.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛的蛋白质来源和钙。

sentences.english: So, what happens, this is another view of a sodium channel, so this is actually looking a little bit more at the protein structure .
sentences.chinese: 那么，这里发生了什么，这是钠离子通道的另一张图片，在这种蛋白质结构中，它看起来更复杂一点。

detailed_translations.english: one of several natural substances that exist in food such as meat, eggs, and beans, and which your body needs in order to grow and remain strong and healthy

name: recession
trans: n. 衰退；不景气；后退；凹处

sentences.english: the economic recession of the early 1980s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代初的经济衰退

sentences.english: There is deep recession in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 英国处于严重的经济衰退之中。

detailed_translations.english: a difficult time when there is less trade, business activity etc in a country than usual

sentences.english: The plane started taxiing down the runway.
sentences.chinese: 该飞机开始沿跑道滑行。

detailed_translations.english: a long specially prepared hard surface like a road on which aircraft land and take off

name: sample
trans: adj. 试样的，样品的；作为例子的
vt. 取样；尝试；抽样检查

sentences.english: They took a blood sample to test for hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that is examined in order to find out something about the whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验
detailed_translations.english: to taste food or drink in order to see what it is like

name: socialize
trans: vt. 使社会化；使社会主义化；使适应社会生活

sentences.english: ...an open meeting, where members socialized and welcomed any new members.
sentences.chinese: …让会员们相互交流、欢迎所有新成员的一次公开集会。

detailed_translations.english: to spend time with other people in a friendly way

name: span
trans: vt. 跨越；持续；以手指测量

sentences.english: I worked with him over a span of six years.
sentences.chinese: 我和他共事达六年之久。

sentences.english: The bridge crosses the river in a single span.
sentences.chinese: 河上的桥为单跨桥。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that sth lasts or is able to continue

name: strain
trans: n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘
vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力

sentences.english: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.english: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

detailed_translations.english: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard
to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability

name: suspend
trans: vt. 延缓，推迟；使暂停；使悬浮

sentences.english: Sales of the drug will be suspended until more tests are completed.
sentences.chinese: 这种药品在完成进一步检验之前将暂停销售。

sentences.english: Talks between the two countries have now been suspended.
sentences.chinese: 两国间的对话现已中止。

detailed_translations.english: to officially stop something from continuing, especially for a short time

sentences.english: business/commercial venture
sentences.chinese: 商业风投

sentences.english: When darkness fell, he would venture out.
sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

detailed_translations.english: a new business activity that involves taking risks
to go somewhere that could be dangerous

name: virtual
trans: adj.  虚拟的；实质上的，事实上的（但未在名义上或正式获承认）

sentences.english: The website allows you to take a virtual tour of the art gallery.
sentences.chinese: 这个网站可让你对美术馆作一番虚拟参观。

sentences.english: constructing virtual worlds
sentences.chinese: 构筑虚拟世界

detailed_translations.english: made, done, seen etc on the Internet or on a computer, rather than in the real world

name: colony
trans: n. 殖民地；移民队；种群；动物栖息地

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

name: pierce
trans: vt. 刺穿；洞察；响彻；深深地打动

sentences.english: Steam the corn until it can easily be pierced with a fork.
sentences.chinese: 把玉米蒸到用叉子可以轻易扎透。

sentences.english: Rose underwent emergency surgery after a bullet pierced her lung.
sentences.chinese: 罗丝被子弹射穿肺部，接受了紧急手术。

detailed_translations.english: to make a small hole in or through something, using an object with a sharp point
to make a small hole in or through something, using an object with a sharp point

sentences.english: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
sentences.chinese: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。

sentences.english: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another

name: absorption
trans: n. 吸收；全神贯注，专心致志

sentences.english: This controls the absorption of liquids.
sentences.chinese: 这可以控制液体的吸收。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吸收；全神贯注，专心致志
detailed_translations.english: a process in which something takes in liquid, gas, or heat

name: accountancy
trans: n. 会计工作；会计学；会计师之职

sentences.english: He is studying accountancy or he is an accountancy student.
sentences.chinese: 他正在学习会计学或他是一名会计专业的学生。

sentences.english: Whether the enterprise environment is good or not has an effect on accountancy.
sentences.chinese: 企业环境的优劣直接影响会计工作质量的高低。

detailed_translations.english: the profession or work of keeping or checking financial accounts, calculating taxes etc

sentences.english: The job is mainly administrative.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作主要是行政方面的。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the work of managing a company or organization

name: ambitious
trans: adj. 野心勃勃的；有雄心的；热望的；炫耀的

sentences.english: Alfred was intensely ambitious, obsessed with the idea of becoming rich.
sentences.chinese: 艾尔弗雷德雄心勃勃，一心想着发财。

detailed_translations.english: determined to be successful, rich, powerful etc

sentences.english: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

detailed_translations.english: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful

name: breed
trans: vt. 繁殖；饲养；养育，教育；引起

sentences.english: Spaniels are my favourite breed of dog.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙猎犬是我最喜欢的犬种。

sentences.english: Eagles breed during the cooler months of the year.
sentences.chinese: 鹰在一年中较凉爽的季节交配繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that is kept as a pet or on a farm
if animals breed, they  mate in order to have babies

name: bypass
trans: vt. 绕开；忽视；设旁路；迂回

sentences.english: a triple bypass operation
sentences.chinese: 接三通管的手术

sentences.english: Interstate 8 bypasses the town to the north.
sentences.chinese: 八号州际公路绕城向北而行。

detailed_translations.english: a tube that allows gas or liquid to flow around something rather than through it
to go around a town or other busy place rather than through it

sentences.english: In the case of this battle, the combat did only last a singleday.
sentences.chinese: 在译成战役的情况下，这场战斗仅仅持续了短短的一天。

sentences.english: We will remove our combat brigades from Iraq by the end of next summer, and all of our troops by the end of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在明年夏末从伊拉克撤回我们的战斗旅，在2011年末，我们所有军队都将从伊拉克撤出。

sentences.english: These people would then be given training in vigilance and combat not just to defend themselves but also the borders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人会被提供警戒和战斗训练，不仅是为了保护自己，而且要保护边界安全。

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

name: computerize
trans: vt. 使电脑化；使计算机化；用电脑处理

sentences.english: a scheme to computerize the library service
sentences.chinese: 使图书馆服务计算机化的方案

sentences.english: a computerized system for compiling the weekly charts of record sales
sentences.chinese: 编制每周唱片销售榜的计算机化系统

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["computerized information"]}
sentences.chinese: 计算机储存的信息

sentences.english: a computerized database
sentences.chinese: 计算机化的数据库

detailed_translations.chinese: 使计算机化； 用计算机做； 用计算机储存
detailed_translations.english: to use a computer to control the way something is done, to store information etc

sentences.english: an essay comparing and contrasting (= showing how two things are similar and different ) Verdi and Wagner and their operas
sentences.chinese: 把威尔第和瓦格纳以及他们的歌剧进行比较和对照的一篇文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成对比， 对比之下显出区别
detailed_translations.english: if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising
something that is very different from something else
if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising

name: convert
trans: n. 皈依者；改变宗教信仰者
vt. 使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰
vi. 转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰

sentences.english: a 19th-century converted barn
sentences.chinese: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

detailed_translations.english: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

sentences.english: Such a database would be extremely costly to set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立这样一个数据库要花很多钱。

sentences.english: His delay in making a decision could prove costly in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 他的优柔寡断长久下去要付出巨大代价。

detailed_translations.english: very expensive, especially wasting a lot of money

sentences.english: Don’t put boiling water in the glass or it will crack.
sentences.chinese: 不要把沸水倒进这个玻璃杯里，否则它会破裂的。

sentences.english: Concrete is liable to crack in very cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 在严寒的天气条件下混凝土可能会开裂。

sentences.english: He picked up a piece of rock and cracked it in half.
sentences.chinese: 他捡起一块石头，把它击碎成两半。

sentences.english: She fell and cracked a bone in her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，结果一根腿骨骨折。

sentences.english: He cracked a couple of eggs into a pan.
sentences.chinese: 他往平底锅里打了几个鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: to break or to make something break, either so that it gets lines on its surface, or so that it breaks into pieces
a very narrow space between two things or two parts of something

sentences.english: Ron does nothing but criticize and complain all the time.
sentences.chinese: 罗恩什么也不干，只是一味指责和抱怨。

sentences.english: The new law has been widely criticized .
sentences.chinese: 这项新法律受到了广泛的批评。

sentences.english: We look at each other’s work and criticize it.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换作品，互相提出批评意见。

detailed_translations.english: to express your disapproval of someone or something, or to talk about their faults

name: crucial
trans: adj. 重要的；决定性的；定局的；决断的

sentences.english: The conservation of tropical forests is of crucial importance .

sentences.chinese: 词典里的释义

detailed_translations.english: a phrase or sentence that says exactly what a word, phrase, or idea means

sentences.english: a software designer
sentences.chinese: 软件设计师

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make plans or patterns for clothes, furniture, equipment etc

sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme

sentences.chinese: 洪水给该地区带来了死亡和破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 破坏， 毁灭； 消灭

sentences.english: Ethel’s health has deteriorated.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

sentences.english: America’s deteriorating economy
sentences.chinese: 美国日渐恶化的经济

detailed_translations.english: to become worse

name: dispute
trans: vt. 辩论；怀疑；阻止；抗拒

sentences.english: It is beyond dispute that advances in medicine have enabled people to live longer.
sentences.chinese: 医学的发展使人们更加长寿，这是无可置疑的。

sentences.english: What happened next is hotly disputed .
sentences.chinese: 关于后来发生了什么，争论很激烈。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument or disagreement
to argue or disagree with someone

sentences.chinese: 这个行业受五家跨国公司控制。

sentences.english: Her loud voice totally dominated the conversation.
sentences.chinese: 她的大嗓门完全主导着这场谈话。

sentences.english: Education issues dominated the election campaign.
sentences.chinese: 教育问题成了这次选举活动的主要辩题。

sentences.english: There have been generous donations from EU funds.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟基金给予了慷慨的捐款。

detailed_translations.english: something, especially money, that you give to a person or an organ-ization in order to help them

name: elevator
trans: n. 电梯；升降机；升降舵；起卸机

sentences.chinese: 我们只好坐电梯了。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that takes people and goods from one level to another in a building

name: enormous
trans: adj. 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的

sentences.english: an enormous bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 巨大的花束

sentences.english: an enormous amount of money
sentences.chinese: 巨款

sentences.english: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.chinese: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

detailed_translations.english: very big in size or in amount

name: estimate
trans: n. 估计，估价；判断，看法
vt. 估计，估量；判断，评价

sentences.english: Try to estimate how many steps it will take to get to a close object.
sentences.chinese: 估计一下需要多少步才能到达一个近距目标。

detailed_translations.english: to try to judge the value, size, speed, cost etc of something, without calculating it exactly

detailed_translations.chinese: 估计； 评价； 看法

sentences.english: an exceptional student
sentences.chinese: 出类拔萃的学生

sentences.english: A review panel concluded that there were no exceptional circumstances that would warrant a lesser penalty for him.
sentences.chinese: 一个评估小组作出结论：没有什么例外情况可使他获得从轻惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: unusually good

sentences.chinese: 我从孩子们的眼神中看到了期盼。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that something pleasant or exciting is going to happen

trans: n. 专门知识；专门技术；专家的意见

sentences.english: She was not an accountant and didn't have the expertise to verify all of the financial details.
sentences.chinese: 她不是会计，不具有核查所有这些财政细目的专业知识。

trans: n. 暴露；曝光；揭露；陈列

sentences.chinese: 对他地下政治活动的揭露

sentences.chinese: 他俩婚姻失败一事最近被频频曝光。

trans: vt. 挫败；阻挠；使感到灰心

sentences.english: Their attempts to speak to him were frustrated by the guards.
sentences.chinese: 他们想跟他说话，但被警卫拦住了。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent someone’s plans, efforts, or attempts from succeeding

sentences.english: The two departments have slight functional differences.
sentences.chinese: 这两个部门功能稍有不同。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the purpose of something

name: gadget
trans: n. 小玩意；小器具；小配件；诡计

sentences.english: ...sales of kitchen gadgets including toasters, kettles, and percolators.
sentences.chinese: …厨房小用品的销售，包括烤面包机、水壶和咖啡渗滤壶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小玩意；小器具；小配件；诡计
detailed_translations.english: A gadget is a small machine or device which does something useful. You sometimes refer to something as a gadget when you are suggesting that it is complicated and unnecessary.

name: gamble
trans: vi. 赌博；孤注一掷；投机；打赌
vt. 赌博；孤注一掷；冒险假设

sentences.english: Their religion forbids them to drink or gamble.
sentences.chinese: 他们的宗教禁止饮酒和赌博。

sentences.english: Yesterday, he named his cabinet and took a big gamble in the process.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他冒了很大的风险任命了他的内阁。

detailed_translations.english: to risk money or possessions on the result of something such as a game or a race, when you do not know for certain what the result will be
to risk money or possessions on the result of something such as a game or a race, when you do not know for certain what the result will be

detailed_translations.chinese: 赌博； 投机， 冒险
detailed_translations.english: A gamble is a risky action or decision that you take in the hope of gaining money, success, or an advantage over other people

name: gloomy
trans: adj. 黑暗的；沮丧的；阴郁的

sentences.english: The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报告描绘了一幅惨淡的经济现状。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忧郁的， 沮丧的； 令人沮丧的； 昏暗的， 阴沉的
detailed_translations.english: making you feel that things will not improve

sentences.english: Britain could grant Spain’s request .
sentences.chinese: 英国可能会同意西班牙的请求。

sentences.english: I would love to be able to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 我很希望能够满足她的愿望。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something or allow them to have something that they have asked for

name: halt
trans: vi. 停止；立定；踌躇，犹豫

sentences.english: Heavy snowfalls brought traffic to a halt (= made it stop moving ).
sentences.chinese: 大雪使得交通陷于停顿。

sentences.english: The World Championship was brought to a temporary halt (= was stopped from continuing ).
sentences.chinese: 世界锦标赛暂停举行。

sentences.english: The President has called for a halt to the wave of emigration.
sentences.chinese: 总统呼吁遏制移民国外的热潮。

detailed_translations.english: a stop or pause

sentences.english: The airliner was hijacked by a group of terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 该航班被一帮恐怖分子劫持。

when a plane, vehicle etc is hijacked

name: historical
trans: adj. 历史的；史学的；基于史实的

sentences.english: places of historical interest
sentences.chinese: 历史名胜

sentences.english: It is important to look at the novel in its historical context .
sentences.chinese: 在历史背景下看待这部小说很重要。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the past

sentences.chinese: 隐含的威胁

sentences.chinese: 父母应该提防把自己的兴趣强加给孩子。

sentences.chinese: 当局开始对燃油征收一项新税。

name: incidence
trans: n. 发生率；影响； 入射；影响范围

name: index
trans: n. 指标；指数；索引；指针

sentences.chinese: …消费价格指数。

sentences.chinese: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.english: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.chinese: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

trans: adj. 主动的；自发的；起始的

trans: n. 指导书；教员；指导者

sentences.chinese: 驾驶教练

sentences.english: ski instructors
sentences.chinese: 滑雪教练

name: internal
trans: adj. 内部的；里面的；体内的；（机构）内部的

sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets

sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

sentences.chinese: 他们西班牙语说得很好，答应替我翻译。

detailed_translations.english: to translate spoken words from one language into another

sentences.chinese: 她跳过篱笆。

sentences.chinese: 他把一根枝条扔到河里，那条狗一个飞跃就追了过去。

a big jump

name: log
trans: n. 记录；航行日志；原木

sentences.chinese: 原木燃烧的熊熊大火

detailed_translations.english: a thick piece of wood from a tree

name: lunar
trans: adj. 月亮的，月球的；阴历的；银的；微亮的

sentences.english: studies of the lunar surface
sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

sentences.english: Genet started as a rebel, but soon became part of the literary mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 热内起初很叛逆，但不久就回归了文学主流。

detailed_translations.english: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods

name: mall
trans: n. 购物商场；林荫路；铁圈球场

sentences.chinese: 在冬日里,我前往这个购物商场。

sentences.english: If you see something you like at the mall, walk away.
sentences.chinese: 如果在商城里看见某件你喜欢的东西，（别买）走开。

sentences.english: the company that manufactured the drug
sentences.chinese: 生产这种药的公司

sentences.english: manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 工业品，制成品

sentences.english: Cost will determine the methods of manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 成本将决定生产方法。

sentences.english: a major importer of cotton manufactures
sentences.chinese: 棉花产品的主要进口商

detailed_translations.english: to use machines to make goods or materials, usually in large numbers or amounts
the process of making goods or materials using machines, usually in large numbers or amounts

sentences.english: She lost the election by a mere 20 votes.
sentences.chinese: 她仅仅以20票之差落选。

name: minor
trans: adj. 未成年的；次要的；较小的；小调的；二流的
n. 未成年人；小调；副修科目

sentences.english: We have made some minor changes to the program.
sentences.chinese: 我们对那个程序做了一些小改动。

sentences.english: a relatively minor error
sentences.chinese: 相对较小的错误

sentences.english: a minor road
sentences.chinese: 小路

sentences.english: They played only a minor role in local government.
sentences.chinese: 他们在当地政府里只是扮演次要角色。

detailed_translations.english: small and not very important or serious, especially when compared with other things

name: mount

n. 山峰；底座；乘骑用马；攀，登；运载工具；底座

sentences.chinese: 他登上楼梯，慢慢环顾四周。

sentences.english: Mount Qomolangma
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰

detailed_translations.english: to go up a step or stairs
used as part of the name of a mountain

name: neighborhood
trans: n. 附近；街坊；接近；街区

sentences.english: Iterates may be categorized into stable and unstable sets depending on whether a neighborhood under iteration converges or diverges. Some move toward stability, others away.
sentences.chinese: 根据一个受迭代影响的社区是聚合还是发散，迭代可以被归类到稳定和不稳定集。有些转向稳定，有些转离。

name: ongoing
trans: adj. 不间断的，进行的；前进的

sentences.english: their ongoing search for a new director
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在寻找一个新主任

sentences.english: ongoing negotiations
sentences.chinese: 还在进行的谈判

sentences.english: The discussions are still ongoing.
sentences.chinese: 讨论仍在继续。

detailed_translations.english: continuing, or continuing to develop

name: orient
trans: vt. 使适应；确定方向；使朝东

sentences.english: She looked at the street names, trying to orient herself.
sentences.chinese: 她看看街名，试图确定自己的方位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应；确定方向；使朝东
detailed_translations.english: to find exactly where you are by looking around you or using a map
the eastern part of the world, especially China and Japan
to find exactly where you are by looking around you or using a map

name: outdated
trans: v. 使过时（outdate的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: outdated teaching methods
sentences.chinese: 不合时宜的教学方法

sentences.english: a factory with outdated equipment
sentences.chinese: 设备陈旧的工厂

sentences.english: His writing style is now boring and outdated.
sentences.chinese: 他的写作风格如今已显得乏味而过时了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is outdated, it is no longer considered useful or effective, because something more modern exists

name: outdoor
trans: adj. 户外的；露天的；野外的（等于out-of-door）

sentences.english: a huge outdoor market
sentences.chinese: 一个规模庞大的露天市场

sentences.english: outdoor recreational activities
sentences.chinese: 户外娱乐活动

sentences.english: outdoor clothing
sentences.chinese: 户外装

sentences.english: a healthy outdoor life
sentences.chinese: 有益健康的户外生活

detailed_translations.english: existing, happening, or used outside, not inside a building

name: overtake
trans: vt. 赶上；压倒；突然来袭

sentences.english: He pulled out to overtake the van.
sentences.chinese: 他把车驶出所在车道想超过那辆小货车。

sentences.english: Never try to overtake on a bend.
sentences.chinese: 绝不要在转弯处超车。

detailed_translations.english: to go past a moving vehicle or person because you are going faster than them and want to get in front of them

name: peer
trans: n. 贵族；同等的人；同龄人

sentences.english: American children did less well in math than their peers in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.english: Staff members are trained by their peers.
sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

name: perceive
trans: vt. 察觉，感觉；理解；认知

sentences.english: That morning, he perceived a change in Franca’s mood.
sentences.chinese: 那天早上，他注意到弗兰卡情绪的变化。

sentences.english: Cats are not able to perceive colour.
sentences.chinese: 猫不能辨别颜色。

detailed_translations.english: to notice, see, or recognize something

name: persistent
trans: adj. 固执的，坚持的；持久稳固的

sentences.english: persistent rumours
sentences.chinese: 持续流传的谣言

sentences.english: persistent headaches
sentences.chinese: 持续头疼

sentences.english: a persistent problem
sentences.chinese: 长期问题

sentences.english: persistent rain
sentences.chinese: 连绵的雨

detailed_translations.english: continuing to exist or happen, especially for longer than is usual or desirable

name: poll
trans: n. 投票；民意测验；投票数；投票所
adj. 无角的；剪过毛的；修过枝的
vt. 投票；剪短；对…进行民意测验；获得选票

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

sentences.english: This last task is possibly the most difficult.
sentences.chinese: 这最后一项任务也许是最难的。

sentences.english: It will take three weeks, possibly longer.
sentences.chinese: 要花三个星期，也许更久。

sentences.english: ‘Will you be here tomorrow?’ ‘Possibly.’
sentences.chinese: “你明天到这儿来吗？”“也许吧。”

sentences.english: ‘Was it murder?’ ‘ Quite possibly (= it is very likely ) .’
sentences.chinese: “是谋杀吗？”“很可能是。”

sentences.chinese: 从事这些工作的女性报酬之所以较低正是因为做这些工作的人大部分是女性而不是男性。

sentences.english: Prince Rainier of Monaco
sentences.chinese: 摩纳哥的兰尼埃亲王

sentences.english: the body’s natural rhythms

sentences.chinese: 缓坡

sentences.chinese: 她回头望了一眼那绿草如茵的坡地。

sentences.chinese: 一座向河边倾斜的宜人花园

sentences.chinese: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.chinese: 执政党工党的代表大会

sentences.chinese: 盖屋顶的承包商

sentences.chinese: 围绕斯金纳的理论的争议

sentences.chinese: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.chinese: 阿塔兰特跑起来很快。

sentences.chinese: 住房条件差引起的健康问题

sentences.english: a scheme to provide affordable housing for local people
sentences.chinese: 为当地民众提供平价住宅的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 房屋， 住宅； 住房建筑， 住房供给； 外壳， 外罩
detailed_translations.english: the houses or conditions that people live in

name: ideal
trans: adj. 理想的；完美的；想象的；不切实际的

sentences.english: advice on how to reach your ideal weight
sentences.chinese: 如何达到理想体重的建议

sentences.english: The scheme offers an ideal opportunity for youngsters to get training.
sentences.chinese: 该计划为年轻人提供了获得培训的极好机会。

sentences.english: With so much rain, conditions are far from ideal.
sentences.chinese: 雨水这么多，天气情况很不理想。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable that something could possibly be
a principle about what is morally right or a perfect standard that you hope to achieve

name: illustrate
trans: vt. 阐明，举例说明；图解

sentences.english: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.chinese: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.english: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

detailed_translations.english: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

name: indicator
trans: n. 指示器； 指示剂； 指示符；压力计

sentences.english: All the main economic indicators suggest that trade is improving.
sentences.chinese: 所有主要的经济指标都表明贸易情况正在改善。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示器；[试剂] 指示剂；[计] 指示符；压力计
detailed_translations.english: something that can be regarded as a sign of something else

sentences.english: a writer of great insight
sentences.chinese: 有深刻洞察力的作家

sentences.english: The book gives us fascinating insights into life in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 这本书生动地表现了墨西哥的生活。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to understand and realize what people or situations are really like

sentences.english: It’s difficult to earn a livelihood as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 搞艺术很难谋生。

sentences.english: Bates says he will lose his livelihood if his driving licence is taken away.
sentences.chinese: 贝茨说，如果驾照被吊销，他就没有了谋生的手段。

detailed_translations.english: the way you earn money in order to live

name: maximise
trans: vt. 把…增加到最大限度；尽量增大（等于maximize）

detailed_translations.chinese: 使增加到最大限度， 最佳化； 充分利用

name: maximize
trans: vt. 取…最大值；对…极为重视
vi. 尽可能广义地解释；达到最大值

sentences.english: We need to maximize the space.
sentences.chinese: 我们要充分利用空间。

detailed_translations.english: to  click  on a special part on a window on a computer screen so that it becomes as big as the screen

sentences.english: Don’t be misled by appearances, he’s a good worker.
sentences.chinese: 不要被表象迷惑，他工作干得挺不错的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone believe something that is not true by giving them information that is false or not complete

sentences.english: After a while, we naturally started talking about the children.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我们自然而然地谈起了孩子。

sentences.english: naturally occurring chemicals
sentences.chinese: 天然存在的化学物质

detailed_translations.english: in a way that you would expect

sentences.english: Joyce’s style of writing was a striking departure from the literary norm.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯的写作风格与传统的文学风格大相径庭。

detailed_translations.english: the usual or normal situation, way of doing something etc

sentences.english: The plant absorbs nutrients from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸取养分。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical or food that provides what is needed for plants or animals to live and grow

sentences.english: Employers have an obligation to treat all employees equally.
sentences.chinese: 雇主有责任对所有员工一视同仁。

sentences.english: Parents are under a legal obligation to educate their children.
sentences.chinese: 家长对子女的教育负有法律责任。

sentences.english: You are under no obligation to buy any more books.
sentences.chinese: 你不必非要买更多的书。

sentences.english: Greater resources are needed to meet these obligations.
sentences.chinese: 履行这些义务需要更多的资源。

sentences.english: the rights and obligations imposed on them by treaties
sentences.chinese: 条约给他们规定的权利和义务

sentences.english: The government must pay for health care for war veterans – it is an obligation we owe to them.
sentences.chinese: 政府必须为退伍军人支付医疗保健费用——这是我们对他们负有的义务。

sentences.english: a moral obligation to help the poor
sentences.chinese: 帮助穷人的道德义务

sentences.english: He stayed with the team out of a sense of obligation.
sentences.chinese: 他出于责任感而留在队里。

detailed_translations.english: a moral or legal duty to do something

name: passion
trans: n. 激情；热情；酷爱；盛怒

sentences.english: The issue arouses strong passions.
sentences.chinese: 那件事激起了人们强烈的情绪。

sentences.english: Gardening was her great passion.
sentences.chinese: 她酷爱园艺。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈的情感，激情；强烈的爱好，热爱
detailed_translations.english: a very strong belief or feeling about something

name: patch
trans: n. 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地

sentences.english: Look out for icy patches on the road.
sentences.chinese: 小心路上结冰的地方。

sentences.english: a cat with a white patch on its chest
sentences.chinese: 胸部有一块白斑的猫

sentences.english: He combs his hair over his bald patch .
sentences.chinese: 他把头发梳过来盖住秃掉的地方。

detailed_translations.chinese: 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地
detailed_translations.english: a small area of something that is different from the area around it
to repair a hole in something by putting a piece of something else over it

sentences.english: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.english: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.chinese: 山谷全景

sentences.english: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of drawing a picture that makes objects look solid and shows distance and depth, or the effect this method produces in a picture

name: placement
trans: n. 布置；定位球；人员配置

sentences.english: The physician examines the patient then diagnoses the disease and prescribes medication.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生检查了病人，然后对疾病作出诊断，并开出药方。

sentences.english: What punishment does the law prescribe for this crime?
sentences.chinese: 法律规定这种罪行应受何处罚？

detailed_translations.english: to say what medicine or treatment a sick person should have

name: privacy
trans: n. 隐私；秘密；隐居；隐居处

sentences.english: each individual’s right to privacy
sentences.chinese: 每个人的隐私权

detailed_translations.english: the state of being free from public attention

name: proceed
trans: vi. 开始；继续进行；发生；行进

sentences.english: Before proceeding further, we must define our terms.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须先定义术语，然后再往下展开。

detailed_translations.english: to continue to do something that has already been planned or started

name: proportion
trans: n. 比例，占比；部分；面积；均衡
vt. 使成比例；使均衡；分摊

sentences.english: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.english: What’s the proportion of boys to girls in your class?
sentences.chinese: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a part of a number or an amount, considered in relation to the whole

name: reaction
trans: n. 反应，感应；反动，复古；反作用

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

detailed_translations.english: something that you feel or do because of something that has happened or been said

name: recruit
trans: vi. 复原；征募新兵；得到补充；恢复健康
vt. 补充；聘用；征募；使…恢复健康

sentences.english: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.english: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.chinese: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

sentences.english: Drill sergeants have eight weeks to turn fresh recruits into soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 操练军士要在八个星期之内把新兵训练成真正的士兵。

detailed_translations.english: to find new people to work in a company, join an organization, do a job etc
someone who has just joined the army, navy, or  air force

name: reluctant
trans: adj. 不情愿的；勉强的；顽抗的

sentences.english: She gave a reluctant smile.
sentences.chinese: 她勉强笑了笑。

detailed_translations.english: slow and unwilling

sentences.english: The problems in our schools do not have a simple remedy.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校的问题没有简单的解决办法。

sentences.english: To remedy the situation, the water must be chemically treated.
sentences.chinese: 为了改善这种情况，水必须进行化学处理。

detailed_translations.english: a way of dealing with a problem or making a bad situation better
to deal with a problem or improve a bad situation

name: repeatedly
trans: adv. 反复地；再三地；屡次地

sentences.english: Graham was repeatedly warned not to work so hard.
sentences.chinese: 格雷厄姆一再被提醒工作不要这么拼命。

detailed_translations.english: many times

name: resolve
trans: n. 坚决；决定要做的事
vt. 决定；溶解；使…分解；决心要做…

sentences.english: Barnet was desperate for money to resolve his financial problems.
sentences.chinese: 巴尼特急需钱来解决他的经济问题。

sentences.english: After the divorce she resolved never to marry again.
sentences.chinese: 离婚以后，她决心永不再嫁。

sentences.english: Recent events strengthened her resolve to find out the truth.
sentences.chinese: 最近发生的事件坚定了她找出真相的决心。

detailed_translations.english: to find a satisfactory way of dealing with a problem or difficulty
strong determination to succeed in doing something

name: rival
trans: vt. 与…竞争；比得上某人

sentences.english: This gives the company a competitive advantage over its rivals.
sentences.chinese: 这使该公司与其对手相比具有一项竞争优势。

sentences.english: He finished 39 seconds ahead of his main rival .
sentences.chinese: 他比主要对手早39秒到达终点。

sentences.english: She was 2 minutes faster than her nearest rival .
sentences.chinese: 她比紧随其后的对手快两分钟。

sentences.english: a game against their old rivals , Manchester United
sentences.chinese: 和他们的老对手曼联队的比赛

sentences.english: They still remain bitter rivals (= hate each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们仍是死敌。

sentences.english: Their sales have now overtaken those of their arch-rival (= main or strongest rival ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的销售额现已超过了主要竞争对手。

detailed_translations.english: a person, group, or organization that you compete with in sport, business, a fight etc

name: sake
trans: n. 目的；利益；理由；日本米酒

sentences.english: He moved to the seaside for the sake of his health.
sentences.chinese: 他为了健康而迁居海滨。

sentences.english: I only went for Kay’s sake.
sentences.chinese: 我是为了凯才去的。

sentences.english: I hope he’s told the truth for his own sake (= because it will be good for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 为了他自己好，我希望他已经说出了真相。

detailed_translations.english: in order to help, improve, or please someone or something

name: somewhat
trans: adv. 有点；多少；几分；稍微

sentences.english: Things have changed somewhat since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，情况就有些不一样了。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little but not very

name: specialize
trans: vi. 专门从事；详细说明；特化
vt. 使专门化；使适应特殊情况；详细说明

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

name: standardize
trans: vt. 使标准化；用标准检验

sentences.english: Attempts to standardize English spelling have never been successful.
sentences.chinese: 统一英语拼写的尝试从未成功过。

sentences.english: standardized tests
sentences.chinese: 标准化测试

detailed_translations.english: to make all the things of one particular type the same as each other

name: stretch
trans: vt. 伸展,张开；（大量地）使用，消耗（金钱，时间）；使竭尽所能；使全力以赴；
vi. 伸展；足够买（或支付）

sentences.english: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠，伸了伸懒 腰。

sentences.english: Always stretch before exercising.
sentences.chinese: 锻炼之前都要做伸展运动。

detailed_translations.english: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to reach a long way for something

detailed_translations.chinese: 一段时间； 一段距离；延伸， 连绵； 连绵的一片
detailed_translations.english: a continuous period of time

name: stroke
trans: n. （游泳或划船的）划；中风；（打、击等的）一下；冲程；（成功的）举动；尝试；轻抚
vt. （用笔等）画；轻抚；轻挪；敲击；划尾桨；划掉；（打字时）击打键盘
vi. 击球；作尾桨手，指挥划桨；（打字时）击打键盘

sentences.english: She died following a massive stroke.
sentences.chinese: 她重度中风后去世了。

sentences.english: a stroke patient
sentences.chinese: 中风患者

sentences.english: His punishment was six strokes of the cane.
sentences.chinese: 给他的惩罚是挨六教鞭。

sentences.english: At the first stroke it will be 9 o'clock exactly.
sentences.chinese: 等到钟敲第一下时就是9点整。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden serious illness when a blood vessel in the brain bursts or is blocked, which can cause death or the loss of the ability to move or to speak clearly

name: substantial
trans: adj. 大量的；实质的；内容充实的

sentences.english: We have the support of a substantial number of parents.
sentences.chinese: 我们有相当多家长的支持。

sentences.english: a substantial salary
sentences.chinese: 丰厚的薪水

sentences.english: a substantial breakfast
sentences.chinese: 丰盛的早餐

sentences.english: The document requires substantial changes.
sentences.chinese: 文件需要作大量修改。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可观的， 大量的； 物质的， 坚固的； 实质的， 真实的
detailed_translations.english: large in amount or number

name: surge
trans: n. 汹涌；大浪，波涛；汹涌澎湃；巨涌
v. 汹涌；起大浪，蜂拥而来

sentences.english: a device that protects your computer against electrical surges
sentences.chinese: 一台计算机电涌保护设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 汹涌；大浪，波涛；汹涌澎湃；巨涌
detailed_translations.english: a sudden quick movement of a liquid, electricity, chemical etc through something
if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly

name: territory
trans: n. 领土，领域；范围；地域；版图

sentences.english: Hong Kong is a Chinese territory.
sentences.chinese: 香港是中国的领土。

sentences.english: The company is moving into unfamiliar territory with this new software.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正通过这种新软件进入一个不熟悉的领域。

detailed_translations.english: land that is owned or controlled by a particular country, ruler, or military force

name: tremendous
trans: adj. 极大的，巨大的；惊人的；极好的

sentences.english: Suddenly, there was a tremendous bang, and the whole station shook.
sentences.chinese: 突然一声巨响，整个车站都晃动了。

sentences.english: She was making a tremendous effort to appear calm.
sentences.chinese: 她竭力表现出平静的样子。

sentences.english: She praised her husband for the tremendous support he had given her.
sentences.chinese: 她称赞丈夫给了她巨大支持。

sentences.english: Sales have been tremendous so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年到目前为止，销售额十分惊人。

sentences.english: This plan could save us a tremendous amount of money.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划能给我们节省一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: very big, fast, powerful etc

name: utility
trans: n. 实用；效用；公共设施；功用
adj. 实用的；通用的；有多种用途的

sentences.english: Does your rent include utilities?
sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

name: verbal
trans: n. 动词的非谓语形式
adj. 口头的；言语的；动词的；照字面的

sentences.english: verbal skills
sentences.chinese: 语言技能

detailed_translations.chinese: 口头的； 用言辞的， 用文字的； 动词的
detailed_translations.english: spoken rather than written

name: vessel
trans: n. 船，舰； 脉管，血管；容器，器皿

sentences.english: a fishing vessel
sentences.chinese: 渔船

sentences.english: a burst blood vessel
sentences.chinese: 破裂的血管

sentences.english: a Bronze Age drinking vessel
sentences.chinese: 青铜器时代的饮具

detailed_translations.english: a ship or large boat

sentences.english: There must have been some misunderstanding. I didn’t order all these books.
sentences.chinese: 一定是弄错了，这些书不全是我订的。

detailed_translations.english: a problem caused by someone not understanding a question, situation, or instruction correctly
